1.verse: Engero za Sulemaani, mutabani wa Dawudi, kabaka wa Isirayiri.

2.verse: Yaziwandiika okuyigiriza abantu okuba n’amagezi n’okuyiga, era n’okutegeera ebigambo eby’obulabufu; eby’obulamu eby’amagezi n’empisa.

3.verse: Sulemaani yayagala abantu okuba n’empisa, n’obulamu obw’amagezi, okukolanga ebituufu, n’okubeera abenkanya n’okugobereranga ensonga;

4.verse: okuyigiriza amagezi abatalina bumanyirivu, n’abavubuka okufuna okumanya n’okutegeera.

5.verse: N’abantu ab’amagezi nabo bwe bawulira beeyongere okuyiga n’abategeevu beeyongere okubangulwa.

6.verse: Era engero zino zaawandiikibwa okutegeera engero, enjogera n’ebikokyo.

7.verse: Kale mu kutya MUKAMA amagezi mwe gasookera, naye abasirusiru banyooma amagezi n’okulagirirwa.

8.verse: Amagezi eri Abavubuka - Mwana wange ossangayo omwoyo eri ebiragiro bya kitaawo, era tolekanga kukuutira kwa maama wo;

9.verse: bijja kuba ngule eneeweesanga omutwe gwo ekitiibwa, n’emikuufu mu bulago bwo.

10.verse: Mwana wange abakozi b’ebibi bwe bakusendasendanga, tokkirizanga.

11.verse: Bwe bakugambanga nti, “Tugende ffenna twesanyuse, tunyage, tubbe n’okutta; tokkirizanga;

12.verse: ng’entaana bw’emira abantu, naffe tubamire tutyo nga bakyali balamu, era nga balamba, ng’abagenda mu bunnya obuwanvu;

13.verse: nga twefunira eby’obugagga bye tutakoleredde, ne tujjuza amayumba gaffe obugagga obubbe;

14.verse: ng’ababi batuyita tubeegatteko, tugabane kyenkanyi ebibbe n’ebinyage.”

15.verse: Mwana wange totambuliranga wamu nabo, era ekigere kyo kiziyize okukwatanga ekkubo lyabwe:

16.verse: Kubanga ebigere byabwe bidduka bunnambiro okukola ebibi, era kibanguyira okuyiwa omusaayi.

17.verse: Nga kuba kumala biseera okutega omutego, ng’ekinyonyi ky’oyagala okukwata kikulaba,

18.verse: naye abantu ng’abo baba beetega bokka, baba beetega omutego ogunaabakwasa bo bennyini.

19.verse: Bwe lityo bwe libeera ekkubo lya buli muntu anoonya okugaggawalira mu bukyamu. Obugagga obw’engeri eyo busaanyaawo obulamu bw’abo ababufuna.

20.verse: Okulabula Eri Abanyooma Amagezi - Amagezi galeekaanira waggulu mu nguudo; gayimusa amaloboozi gaago, mu bifo ebigazi eby’omu bibuga.

21.verse: Ne galeekaanira waggulu, mu kifo enguudo ennene we zisisinkanira, era gasinzira mu miryango gy’ekibuga ne googera:

22.verse: Mulituusa ddi mmwe ab’amagezi amatono obutayagala kweyongera kuyiga by’amagezi, nammwe ab’amalala okunyoomanga eby’amagezi n’abasirusiru okukyawanga okumanya?

23.verse: Kale singa muwuliriza okunenya kwange, laba, ndifuka omutima gwange n’ebirowoozo byange mu mmwe.

24.verse: Kubanga na bayita ne mugaana okuwuliriza, ne ngolola omukono ne wataba n’omu afaayo,

25.verse: era ne mutafaayo ku magezi ge nabawa, era ne mugaana okubuulirira kwange kwonna,

26.verse: kale nange ndibasekerera nga muli mu nnaku, era mbakudaalire ng’entiisa ebagwiridde.

27.verse: Entiisa bw’eribajjira ng’omuyaga omungi, ennaku n’okubonaabona, okulumwa n’obubalagaze,

28.verse: kale balinkoowoola, naye siriyitaba; balinnoonya obutaweera naye ne batandaba.

29.verse: Kubanga baakyawa okuyigirizibwa, n’okumanya, era ne bamalirira obutatya MUKAMA.

30.verse: Ne bagaana okuwuliriza amagezi gange; ne banyooma okunenya kwange kwonna.

31.verse: Kyebaliva balya ebibala eby’ekkubo lyabwe ebbi, era ne bajjula ebibala eby’enkwe zaabwe.

32.verse: Obusirusiru bulitta ab’amagezi amatono n’obutafaayo bulizikiriza abasirusiru,

33.verse: naye buli ampuliriza anaabeeranga mirembe, ng’agumye nga talina kutya kwonna.

1.verse: Empeera y’Okunoonya Amagezi - Mwana wange, bw’onookwatanga ebigambo byange, n’otereka ebiragiro byange mu bulamu bwo,

2.verse: era n’ossaayo omwoyo eri amagezi, era n’ossa omutima gwo eri okutegeera,

3.verse: ddala ddala singa oyaayaanira okumanya era n’oyimusa eddoboozi lyo osabe okutegeera,

4.verse: bw’onooganoonyanga nga ffeeza, era n’oganoonyanga ng’ekyobugagga ekyakwekebwa,

5.verse: awo w’olitegeerera okutya MUKAMA, era n’ovumbula okumanya Katonda.

6.verse: Kubanga MUKAMA awa amagezi; era mu kamwa ke muvaamu okumanya n’okutegeera.

7.verse: MUKAMA aterekera abatuukirivu amagezi amalungi, era aba ngabo y’abo abatambulira mu bugolokofu.

8.verse: Abatambuliza mu makubo ag’obwenkanya, era bw’atyo MUKAMA akuuma ekkubo ly’abatukuvu be.

9.verse: Olwo lw’olitegeera obutuukirivu, amazima n’obwenkanya; weewaawo buli kkubo eddungi.

10.verse: Kubanga amagezi galiyingira mu mutima gwo, n’okumanya kulisanyusa omwoyo gwo.

11.verse: Okwesalirawo obulungi kunaakulabiriranga n’okutegeera kunaakukuumanga:

12.verse: Amagezi ganaakuwonyanga ekkubo ly’omubi, n’abantu aboogera eby’obugwagwa,

13.verse: abaleka amakubo ag’obutuukirivu ne batambulira mu makubo ag’ekizikiza,

14.verse: abasanyukira okukola ebikolwa ebibi, abanyumirwa eby’obusirusiru,

15.verse: abantu abo be b’amakubo amakyamu, era abakujjukujju mu ngeri zaabwe.

16.verse: Amagezi MUKAMA g’awa ge gokka agajja okukuwonya ekkubo ly’omukazi omwenzi, n’okukuwonya ebigambo bye ebisendasenda,

17.verse: eyaleka bba ow’omu buvubuka bwe era eyeerabira endagaano gye yakola mu maaso ga Katonda we.

18.verse: Kubanga ennyumba ye ekka mu kufa, n’amakubo ge galaga eri abafu.

19.verse: Tewali n’omu agenda ewuwe adda wadde okufunirayo amakubo g’obulamu.

20.verse: Kale tambuliranga mu kkubo ly’abo abatya Katonda era onywerere mu makubo g’abatuukirivu.

21.verse: Kubanga abatuukirivu balituula mu nsi, era abo abagolokofu baligisigalamu.

22.verse: Naye abakozi b’ebibi balifiirwa ebirungi eby’ensi, n’abatali beesigwa balizikirizibwa.

1.verse: Emikisa Egiva mu kuba n’amagezi - Mwana wange, teweerabiranga bintu bye nakuyigiriza, era okuumanga ebiragiro byange mu mutima gwo,

2.verse: kubanga bijja kuwangaaza obulamu bwo ku nsi, era bikukulaakulanye.

3.verse: Amazima n’ekisa tobyerabiranga; byesibe mu bulago bwo, obiwandiike ku mutima gwo.

4.verse: Bw’otyo bw’onoofuna okuganja n’okusiimibwa eri Katonda n’eri abantu.

5.verse: Weesige MUKAMA n’omutima gwo gwonna, so teweesigamanga ku magezi go gokka.

6.verse: MUKAMA mukulembezenga mu by’okola byonna, naye anaakuluŋŋamyanga n’owangula.

7.verse: Amagezi go tegakusigulanga, naye otyanga MUKAMA, era weewale okukola ebibi.

8.verse: Onoofunanga obulamu mu mubiri gwo n’amagumba go ne gadda buggya.

9.verse: Amagezi n’Obugagga - MUKAMA mugulumizenga n’eby’obugagga byo; n’ebibala ebisooka eby’ebintu byo byonna eby’omu nnimiro yo,

10.verse: olwo amaterekero go lwe ganajjulanga ebintu enkumu, era n’amasenero go ne gajjula ne gabooga omwenge omusu.

11.verse: Mwana wange tonyoomanga kukangavvula kwa MUKAMA, n’okunenya kwe kulemenga okukukooya,

12.verse: kubanga MUKAMA anenya oyo gw’ayagala, nga kitaawe w’omwana bw’anenya mutabani we gwe yeenyumiririzaamu.

13.verse: Aweereddwa omukisa oyo afuna amagezi, omuntu oyo afuna okutegeera,

14.verse: kubanga amagezi gasinga ffeeza era galimu amagoba okusinga zaabu.

15.verse: Amagezi ga muwendo mungi okusinga amayinja ag’omuwendo omungi: era tewali kyegombebwa kiyinza kugeraageranyizibwa nago.

16.verse: Mu mukono gwago ogwa ddyo mwe muli obuwanguzi; ne mu mukono gwago ogwa kkono ne mubaamu obugagga n’ekitiibwa.

17.verse: Mu magezi mulimu essanyu, era n’amakubo gaago ga mirembe.

18.verse: Amagezi muti gwa bulamu eri abo abagakwata ne baganyweza; abo abagakwata ne baganyweza baliweebwa omukisa.

19.verse: Amagezi, MUKAMA ge yakozesa okuteekawo emisingi gy’ensi; n’okutegeera kwe yakozesa okuteekawo eggulu;

20.verse: n’okumanya kwe, kwe yakozesa okwawula obuziba bw’ennyanja, era n’ebire ne bivaamu omusulo.

21.verse: Ab’amagezi Baweebwa Ekitiibwa - Mwana wange, beeranga n’okuteesa okulungi n’okusalawo ebisaana, ebyo biremenga okukuvaako,

22.verse: binaabeeranga obulamu eri emmeeme yo, era ekyokwambala ekirungi ekinaawoomesanga obulago bwo.

23.verse: Bw’otyo bw’onootambulanga nga onyweredde mu kkubo lyo, era ekigere kyo tekijjanga kwesittala.

24.verse: Bw’onoogalamiranga toobenga na kutya, weewaawo bw’oneebakanga otulo tunaakuwoomeranga.

25.verse: Totyanga kabenje kootomanyiridde, wadde okuzikirira okujjira abakozi b’ebibi,

26.verse: Kubanga MUKAMA y’anaabeeranga obwesigwa bwo, era anaalabiriranga ekigere kyo ne kitakwatibwa mu mutego.

27.verse: Tommanga birungi abo be bisaanira bwe kibeera mu buyinza bwo okukikola.

28.verse: Togambanga muliraanwa wo nti, “Genda, onodda enkya ne nkuwa,” ate nga kye yeetaaga okirina.

29.verse: Totegekanga kukola bulabe ku muliraanwa wo, atudde emirembe ng’akwesiga.

30.verse: Tovunaananga muntu n’omu awatali nsonga nga talina kabi k’akukoze.

31.verse: Tokwatirwanga obuggya omuntu ayigganya abalala, era tokolanga nga ye bw’akola,

32.verse: kubanga omuntu omugwagwa wa muzizo eri MUKAMA, naye abo abagolokofu abalinamu obwesige.

33.verse: Ekikolimo kya MUKAMA kiri ku nnyumba y’ababi, naye awa omukisa ennyumba y’abatuukirivu.

34.verse: Ddala ddala, MUKAMA anyooma abanyoomi, naye abeetoowaza abawa ekisa.

35.verse: Ab’amagezi balisikira ekitiibwa, naye abasirusiru baliswazibwa.

1.verse: Amagezi ge gali ku Ntikko - Muwulirize baana bange okuyigiriza kwange ng’okwa kitammwe, era musseeyo omwoyo mufune okutegeera.

2.verse: Kubanga mbawa okuyigiriza okulungi; temulekanga biragiro byange.

3.verse: Bwe nnali omuvubuka nga ndi ne kitange, omwana omu yekka omwagalwa, owa mmange,

4.verse: yanjigiriza n’aŋŋamba nti, “Ebigambo byange bikuumenga ku mutima gwo, kuuma ebiragiro byange obeere mulamu.

5.verse: Funa amagezi; funa okutegeera, teweerabiranga era tovanga ku bigambo bya mu kamwa kange.

6.verse: Togalekanga, nago ganaakukuumanga, gaagale nago ganaakulabiriranga.

7.verse: Ddala amagezi kye kintu ekisingira ddala obukulu; noolwekyo fuba ofune amagezi, era fubira ddala nnyo ofune okutegeera.

8.verse: Amagezi gagulumize, nago gajja kukuyimusa, gaanirize, nago gajja kukuweesa ekitiibwa.

9.verse: Amagezi gajja kukutikkira engule ey’ekisa, era gakuwe n’engule ey’ekitiibwa.”

10.verse: Enjawulo wakati w’Ab’amagezi n’Abagwenyufu - Wuliriza ggwe, mutabani, era okkirize ebigambo byange olyoke owangaalire ku nsi n’essanyu eringi.

11.verse: Nkuluŋŋamya mu kkubo ery’amagezi, ne nkukulembera mu makubo ag’obutuukirivu.

12.verse: Bw’onootambulanga, ekigere kyo kireme okuziyizibwa; era bw’onoddukanga, tojjanga kwesittala.

13.verse: Nywerezanga ddala okuyigirizibwa, tokutanga: kukuumenga kubanga bwe bulamu bwo.

14.verse: Toyingiranga mu kkubo ly’abakozi b’ebibi, wadde okutambulira mu kkubo ly’abantu aboonoonyi.

15.verse: Lyewalenga, tolitambulirangamu, liveeko okwate ekkubo lyo.

16.verse: Kubanga abakozi b’ebibi tebayinza kwebaka okuggyako nga bakoze ebibi, era otulo tubabulira ddala bwe baba tebalina gwe bakozeeko bulabe.

17.verse: Okukola ebibi y’emmere yaabwe, n’okukozesa eryanyi kye kyokunywa kyabwe.

18.verse: Ekkubo ly’abatuukirivu liri ng’enjuba eyakavaayo, eyeeyongera okwaka okutuusa obudde lwe butangaalira ddala.

19.verse: Naye ekkubo ly’ababi liri ng’ekizikiza ekikutte, tebamanyi kibaleetera kwesittala.

20.verse: Mutabani wange wuliriza n’obwegendereza ebigambo byange; osseeyo omwoyo eri bye nkutegeeza;

21.verse: ebigambo bino tebikuvangako, bikuumire ddala mu mutima gwo,

22.verse: kubanga bya bulamu eri abo ababifuna, era biwonya omubiri gwabwe gwonna.

23.verse: Ekisinga byonna kuuma omutima gwo, kubanga y’ensulo y’obulamu bwo.

24.verse: Weewalire ddala eby’obubambavu era n’okwogera ebya swakaba.

25.verse: Amaaso go gatunulenga butereevu, era otunulenga n’obumalirivu eyo gy’olaga.

26.verse: Ttereeza bulungi amakubo go; okwate amakubo ageesigika gokka.

27.verse: Tokyamanga ku mukono ogwa ddyo oba ogwa kkono; ebigere byo byewalenga ekkubo ekyamu.

1.verse: Okulabula ku Bwenzi - Mutabani, ossangayo omwoyo eri ebiragiro byange, era owulirizanga bulungi ebigambo byange eby’amagezi,

2.verse: olyoke oyige okusalawo okw’amagezi, era akamwa ko kavengamu eby’obutegevu.

3.verse: Kubanga emimwa gy’omukazi omwenzi gitonnya omubisi gw’enjuki, n’ebigambo bye biweweevu okusinga omuzigo;

4.verse: naye enkomerero ya byonna, akaawa ng’omususa era asala ng’ekitala eky’obwogi obubiri.

5.verse: Ebigere bye bituuka mu kufa, ebisinde bye biraga emagombe.

6.verse: Tafaayo ku kkubo lya bulamu, amakubo ge gaakyamakyama dda, naye nga takimanyi.

7.verse: Kaakano, batabani bange mumpulirize, temuvanga ku bigambo bya kamwa kange.

8.verse: Mwewalenga omukazi oyo era temusembereranga luggi lwa nnyumba ye;

9.verse: si kulwa nga mufiirwa ekitiibwa kyammwe, n’okumalira ebiseera byammwe ku oyo alina ettima,

10.verse: ate si kulwa nga b’otolina ky’obamanyiiko bakwavuwaza, n’amaanyi go n’ogamalira ku maka g’omulala.

11.verse: Ku nkomerero y’obulamu bwo olisinda, ennyama yo n’omubiri gwo nga biweddewo.

12.verse: Oligamba nti, “Nga nakyawa okulabulwa, n’omutima gwange ne gukyawa okunenyezebwa,

13.verse: era ne sigondera ddoboozi ly’abasomesa bange, wadde okussaayo omwoyo eri abo abampanga amagezi.

14.verse: Ntuuse ku njegoyego z’okuzikirira nga ndi wakati mu kuŋŋaaniro ly’ekibiina.”

15.verse: Obuvunaanyizibwa n’Essanyu mu Bufumbo - Onoonywanga amazzi ag’omu kidiba kyo, n’amazzi agava mu luzzi lwo goonoonywanga.

16.verse: Ensulo zo zisaanye okukulukutira mu nguudo, n’enzizi zo mu bifo ebigazi eby’omu kibuga?

17.verse: Leka bibeere bibyo wekka, bireme kugabanibwako b’otomanyiiko n’akamu.

18.verse: Kale leka ensulo yo ebeere n’omukisa, era osanyuke ne mukazi wo ow’omu buvubuka bwo.

19.verse: Ng’ennangaazi eyeeyagaza n’empeewo esanyusa, leka okusuuta kwe kukumalenga ennaku zonna era naye akwetoloozenga okwagala kwe.

20.verse: Lwaki mwana wange osendebwasendebwa omukazi omwenzi, n’ogwa mu kifuba ky’omukazi w’omusajja omulala?

21.verse: Kubanga MUKAMA alaba amakubo g’omuntu gonna, era n’akebera n’amakubo ge gonna.

22.verse: Ebikolwa by’omukozi w’ebibi bimufuukira omutego, era emiguwa gy’ebikolwa bye ebibi girimusibira ddala.

23.verse: Alifa, kubanga yagaana okwekuuma, era alizikirira olw’obusirusiru bwe obungi.

1.verse: Okulabula ku Butamanya n’Obusirusiru - Mutabani obanga weeyimirira muliraanwa wo, ne weeyama okuyamba omuntu gw’otomanyi, oli mu katyabaga.

2.verse: Obanga weesibye n’ebigambo ggwe kennyini bye wayogera, ng’ebigambo by’omu kamwa ko bikusibye,

3.verse: kino mwana wange ky’oba okola okusobola okwewonya, kubanga kaakano oli mu buyinza bwa muliraanwa wo: Yanguwa, ogende weetoowaze, weegayirire muliraanwa wo.

4.verse: Amaaso go togaganya kwebaka, wadde ebikowe byo okubongoota.

5.verse: Onunule obulamu bwo ng’empeewo bw’edduka okuva mu ngalo z’omuyizzi, era ng’ekinyonyi, bwe kiva mu mutego gw’omutezi.

6.verse: Yigira ku biwuka, mugayaavu ggwe; fumiitiriza engeri gye bikolamu obiyigireko.

7.verse: Tebirina mukulembeze, mukungu oba mufuzi yenna abikulembera,

8.verse: kyokka byekuŋŋaanyiza emmere mu biseera eby’amakungula, ne bitereka emmere mu biseera ebituufu mu mwaka.

9.verse: Olituusa ddi okwebaka mugayaavu ggwe? Oligolokoka ddi n’ova mu tulo two?

10.verse: Otulo otutonotono, n’okusumagira akatono, n’okufunya emikono okuwummulako,

11.verse: obwavu bulikutuukako ng’omutemu, era n’obwetaavu ng’omutemu.

12.verse: Okulabula eri Omuntu Omutabuzitabuzi - Omuntu ataliiko ky’agasa, omusajja omubi agenda ayogera ebigambo ebitabulatabula,

13.verse: agenda atemyatemya ku liiso, nga bw’akuba ebigere ate nga bw’asongasonga olunwe,

14.verse: olw’omutima omukyamu, ateekateeka okukola ebibi, bulijjo aleeta obutakkaanya mu bantu!

15.verse: Noolwekyo okuzikirira kulimujjira mbagirawo, mu kaseera buseera alibetentebwa awatali kuwona.

16.verse: Okulabula ku Bibi Omusanvu - Waliwo ebintu mukaaga MUKAMA by’akyawa, weewaawo musanvu eby’omuzizo gy’ali.

17.verse: Amaaso ag’amalala, emimwa egirimba, okuttira abantu obwereere;

18.verse: omutima ogutegeka okukola ebibi, ebigere ebyanguwa okukola ebibi,

19.verse: obujulizi obw’obulimba, n’omuntu aleeta obutakkaanya mu booluganda.

20.verse: Okulabula Ku Bwenzi - Mwana wange nyweza ebiragiro bya kitaawo, era togayaalirira kuyigiriza kwa maama wo.

21.verse: Bisibenga ku mutima gwo ennaku zonna era obisibe binywerere mu bulago bwo.

22.verse: Bijja kukuluŋŋamyanga buli gy’onoolaganga, ne bw’onoobanga weebase binaakukuumanga, ate ng’ozuukuse binaabanga naawe.

23.verse: Kubanga amateeka ttabaaza, era n’okuyigiriza kitangaala, okukulabula olw’okukuluŋŋamya, ly’ekkubo ery’obulamu,

24.verse: okukuwonya omukazi ow’ebibi, okukuggya mu kunyumiikiriza kw’omukazi omwenzi.

25.verse: Teweegombanga bulungi bwe mu mutima gwo, wadde okumukkiriza okukuwamba n’amaaso ge,

26.verse: kubanga malaaya akussa ku muwendo ogugula omugaati, era omukazi omwenzi anoonya kuzikiririza ddala bulamu bwo.

27.verse: Omuntu ayinza okuwambaatira omuliro mu kifuba kye, ebyambalo bye ne bitaggya?

28.verse: Oba omuntu ayinza okutambulira ku manda agookya, ebigere bye ne bitasiriira?

29.verse: Bwe kityo bwe kiri eri omusajja agenda ne muka muliraanwa we, buli akwata ku mukazi ng’oyo talirema kubonerezebwa olw’ekibi kye.

30.verse: Abantu tebasekerera muntu bw’abba, olw’okwewonya enjala.

31.verse: Naye bwe bamukwata aba alina okuwa engassi ya mirundi musanvu; ne bwe kiba nga kimumalako ebintu bye byonna eby’omu nju ye.

32.verse: Naye buli ayenda ku mukazi talina magezi; kubanga azikiririza ddala emmeeme ye ye.

34.verse: Kubanga obuggya buleetera omusajja okuswakira, era taliba na kisa n’akatono nga yeesasuza.

35.verse: Talikkiriza mutango gwonna, wadde okuwooyawooyezebwa enguzi ennene.

1.verse: Emitawaana Egiva mu Kukwana Omukazi Omwenzi - Mutabani nyweeza ebigambo byange, era okuumenga ebiragiro byange.

2.verse: Kwata ebiragiro byange obeere mulamu, n’amateeka gange ogakuume ng’emmunye y’eriiso lyo;

3.verse: togalekanga kuva mu ngalo zo, gawandiike ku mutima gwo.

4.verse: Amagezi gatwalire ddala nga mwannyoko, n’okutegeera, ng’owooluganda ow’omu kika kyo.

5.verse: Binaakuwonyanga omukazi omwenzi, omukazi omutambuze awaanawaana n’ebigambo ebisendasenda.

6.verse: Lumu nnali nnyimiridde ku ddirisa ly’ennyumba yange.

7.verse: Ne ndaba mu bavubuka abatoototo, omulenzi atalina magezi,

8.verse: ng’ayita mu luguudo okumpi n’akafo k’omukazi omwenzi, n’akwata ekkubo eridda ku nnyumba y’omukazi oyo,

9.verse: olw’eggulo ng’obudde buzibye, ekizikiza nga kikutte.

10.verse: Awo omukazi n’ajja okumusisinkana ng’ayambadde nga malaaya, ng’ajjudde ebirowoozo eby’obukaba mu mutima gwe.

11.verse: Omukazi omukalukalu, atambulatambula ennyo atabeerako waka,

12.verse: wuuyo mu luguudo, wuuyo mu bifo ebikuŋŋaanirwamu, mu buli kafo konna ng’ateega!

13.verse: N’amuvumbagira, n’amunywegera era ng’amutunuulidde nkaliriza n’amaaso agatatya n’amugamba nti:

14.verse: “Nnina ssaddaaka ez’ebiweebwayo olw’emirembe, leero ntukiriza obweyamo bwange.

15.verse: Noolwekyo nzize okukusisinkana, mbadde njagala nnyo okukulaba, era kaakano nkusanze.

16.verse: Obuliri bwange mbwaze bulungi n’engoye eza linena ava mu Misiri.

17.verse: Mbukubye n’akaloosa, n’omugavu, n’obubaane, ne kinamoni, ne kalifuuwa.

18.verse: Jjangu tuwoomerwe omukwano okutuusa obudde okukya; leka twesanyuse ffembi mu mukwano.

19.verse: Kubanga baze taliiyo eka; yatambula olugendo luwanvu:

20.verse: Yagenda n’ensawo y’ensimbi; era alikomawo nga wayiseewo wiiki bbiri.”

21.verse: Yamusendasenda n’ebigambo ebisikiriza; n’amuwabya n’ebigambo ebiwoomerera.

22.verse: Amangwago omuvubuka n’amugoberera ng’ente etwalibwa okuttibwa obanga empeewo egwa mu mutego,

23.verse: okutuusa akasaale lwe kafumita ekibumba kyayo, ng’akanyonyi bwe kanguwa okugwa mu mutego, so tamanyi ng’alifiirwa obulamu bwe.

24.verse: Kaakano nno batabani bange mumpulirize, era musseeyo nnyo omwoyo eri ebigambo byange.

25.verse: Temukkiriza mitima gyammwe kugoberera bigambo bye; temukkiriza bigere byammwe kukyamira mu makubo ge.

26.verse: Kubanga bangi bazikiridde, ddala ab’amaanyi bangi bagudde.

27.verse: Ennyumba ye, lye kkubo eridda emagombe, nga likka mu bisenge eby’okufa.

1.verse: Amagezi Gakoowoola - Amagezi tegakoowoolera waggulu, n’okutegeera ne kuyimusa eddoboozi lyakwo?

2.verse: Ku ntikko y’ebifo ebigulumivu okumpi n’ekkubo, mu masaŋŋanzira, amagezi we gayimirira butengerera,

3.verse: ku mabbali g’enzigi eziyingira mu kibuga, ku miryango, gakoowoolera waggulu nga gagamba nti,

4.verse: Mmwe abantu, mmwe b’empita; nnyimusa eddoboozi lyange eri buli omu ali ku nsi.

5.verse: Mmwe abatategeera mufune okutegeera; nammwe abasirusiru mufune amagezi.

6.verse: Muwulirize kubanga nnina ebintu ebikulu eby’okubagamba, era mu kamwa kange muvaamu ebituufu.

7.verse: Akamwa kange koogera bituufu byereere; kubanga emimwa gyange gikyawa ebitali bya butuukirivu.

8.verse: Ebigambo by’emimwa gyange byonna bya bwenkanya tewali na kimu kikyamu oba kya bukuusa.

9.verse: Ebigambo byange byonna bitegeerekeka eri oyo ategeera, era tebirina kabi eri oyo alina amagezi.

10.verse: Mu kifo kya ffeeza, londawo okuyigiriza kwange, era n’okumanya mu kifo kya zaabu ennongoose obulungi,

11.verse: kubanga amagezi gasinga amayinja ag’omuwendo omungi, era n’ebyo byonna bye weegomba tebiyinza kugeraageranyizibwa nago.

12.verse: Nze Magezi, mbeera wamu n’okuteesa okulungi, era mu nze mulimu okumanya n’okwawula ekirungi n’ekibi.

13.verse: Okutya MUKAMA kwe kukyawa ekibi; nkyawa amalala n’okwemanya, n’obuteeyisa bulungi n’enjogera ey’obubambaavu.

14.verse: Okuteesa okulungi n’okusalawo okw’amagezi bye byange; ntegeera era ndi wa buyinza.

15.verse: Ku bwange, Magezi, bakabaka bafuga, abafuzi ne bakola amateeka ag’obwenkanya.

16.verse: Abalangira bafuga ku bwange, n’abakungu bonna abafuga ku nsi.

17.verse: Njagala abo abanjagala, n’abo abanyiikira okunnoonya bandaba.

18.verse: Obugagga n’ekitiibwa biri mu nze, obugagga obutakoma n’okukulaakulana.

19.verse: Ekibala kyange kisinga zaabu ennongoose, n’ebinvaamu bisinga ffeeza ey’omuwendo omungi.

20.verse: Ntambulira mu kkubo ery’obutuukirivu, mu kkubo ery’obwenkanya,

21.verse: n’abo abanjagala mbagaggawaza era nzijuza amawanika gaabwe.

22.verse: MUKAMA nze gwe yasooka okwoleka nga tannabaako kirala ky’akola.

23.verse: Nateekebwawo dda nnyo, ku lubereberye ng’ensi tennabaawo.

24.verse: Nateekebwawo ng’obuziba bw’ennyanja tebunnateekebwawo, nga n’emigga egireeta amazzi teginnabaawo,

25.verse: ng’ensozi tezinnateekebwa mu bifo byazo, nga n’obusozi tebunnabaawo;

26.verse: nga tannakola nsi newaakubadde amalundiro gaakwo, wadde enfuufu eyasooka ey’oku nsi.

27.verse: Naliwo ng’ateekawo eggulu mu kifo kyalyo, ne bwe yakola enkulungo kungulu ku buziba,

28.verse: ate ne bwe yawanika ebire n’abinywereza waggulu mu bbanga, n’anywereza ddala ensulo z’amazzi,

29.verse: bwe yawa ennyanja ensalo zaazo we zikoma, amazzi galeme kusukka we yagalagira, ne bwe yali ng’alamba emisingi gy’ensi.

30.verse: Nnali naye ng’omukozi omukugu, nga nzijudde essanyu lye erya buli lunaku, nga nsanyukira mu maaso ge bulijjo,

31.verse: nga nsanyukira mu nsi ye yonna, era nga ne nesiima olw’abaana b’abantu.

32.verse: Kale nno, batabani bange mumpulirize; balina omukisa abo abakwata amakubo gange!

33.verse: Muwulirizenga okuyigirizibwa, mubenga n’amagezi, so temugalekanga.

34.verse: Alina omukisa omuntu ampuliriza, alindirira nga bw’akuuma ku nzigi zange buli lunaku.

35.verse: Kubanga buli andaba afuna obulamu, era afuna okuganja eri MUKAMA.

36.verse: Oyo atannoonya yeerumya yekka, era n’abo bonna abankyawa banoonya kufa.

1.verse: Empagi z’Amagezi Omusanvu - Amagezi gazimbye ennyumba yaago, gagizimbidde ku mpagi musanvu.

2.verse: Gategese ennyama yaago ne wayini waago; gategese ekijjulo.

3.verse: Gatumye abawala abaweereza bakoowoolere mu bifo ebigulumivu nti,

4.verse: “Buli atalina kutegeera akyameko wano!” Eri abo abatalina magezi gabagamba nti,

5.verse: “Mujje mulye ku mmere yange era munywe ne ku nvinnyo gwe ntabudde.

6.verse: Mulekeraawo obutaba na kutegeera mubeere balamu, era mutambulire mu kkubo ly’okumanya.”

7.verse: Oyo anenya omunyoomi ayolekera kuvumwa, n’oyo abuulirira omukozi w’ebibi yeeretera kuvumibwa.

8.verse: Tonenyanga munyoomi, aleme okukukyawa, naye nenya ow’amagezi naye anaakwagalanga.

9.verse: Yigirizanga ow’amagezi naye aneeyongeranga okuba n’amagezi, yigirizanga omutuukirivu, aneeyongerangako okuyiga.

10.verse: “Mu kutya MUKAMA amagezi mwe gasookera, era n’okumanya oyo Omutukuvu Katonda, kwe kutegeera.

11.verse: Ku lwange oliwangaala emyaka mingi nnyo, era olyongerwako emyaka.

12.verse: Bw’obeera omugezi, amagezi go gakuyamba, naye bw’onyooma amagezi weerumya wekka.”

13.verse: Omukazi omusirusiru aleekaana, taba na mpisa era taba na magezi!

14.verse: Era atuula mu mulyango gw’ennyumba ye, ne ku ntebe mu bifo eby’ekibuga ebisinga obugulumivu,

15.verse: ng’akoowoola abo abayitawo, ababa batambula amakubo gaabwe abali ku byabwe.

16.verse: Abagamba nti, “Buli alina okumanya okutono ajje muno.” Era eri oyo atalina kutegeera agamba nti,

17.verse: “Amazzi amabbe nga gawooma! emmere eriibwa mu kyama ng’ewooma!”

18.verse: Naye oyo agwa mu kitimba kye tamanya nti nnyumba yakuzikirira, era nti abagenyi be bali mu buziba obw’emagombe.

1.verse: Engero za Sulemaani - Engero za Sulemaani: Omwana ow’amagezi asanyusa kitaawe; naye omwana omusirusiru anakuwaza nnyina.

2.verse: Eby’obugagga ebifuniddwa mu makubo amakyamu tebirina kye bigasa, naye abatuukirivu banunulwa okuva mu kufa.

3.verse: MUKAMA taalekenga mutuukirivu we kufa njala, naye aziyiza abakozi b’ebibi okufuna bye beetaaga.

4.verse: Emikono emigayaavu gyavuwaza, naye emikono eminyiikivu gireeta obugagga.

5.verse: Omuvubuka ow’amagezi akungulira mu biseera ebituufu, naye oyo eyeebakira mu biro eby’okukunguliramu mwana aswaza ennyo.

6.verse: Omukisa gubeera ku mutwe gw’omutuukirivu, naye akamwa k’omukozi w’ebibi kajjula obukambwe.

7.verse: Omutuukirivu anajjukirwanga n’essanyu, naye erinnya ly’omubi linaavundanga.

8.verse: Alina omutima ogw’amagezi agondera ebiragiro, naye omusirusiru ayogerayogera, azikirizibwa.

9.verse: Atambulira mu bwesimbu y’atambula emirembe, naye akwata amakubo amakyamu alitegeerebwa.

10.verse: Oyo atta ku liiso ng’akweka amazima aleeta ennaku, n’omusirusiru ayogerayogera alizikirizibwa.

11.verse: Akamwa ak’omutuukirivu nsulo ya bulamu, naye akamwa k’omukozi w’ebibi kajjula bulabe.

12.verse: Obukyayi buleeta enjawukana, naye okwagala kubikka ku bibi bingi.

13.verse: Amagezi gasangibwa ku mimwa gy’oyo alina okutegeera, naye omuggo gukangavvula oyo atamanyi kusalawo bulungi.

14.verse: Abantu ab’amagezi batereka okumanya, naye akamwa k’omusirusiru kaaniriza kuzikirira.

15.verse: Obugagga bw’omugagga kye kibuga kye ekiriko ebigo, naye obwavu kwe kuzikirira kw’omwavu.

16.verse: Empeera y’omutuukirivu bulamu, naye empeera y’omukozi w’ebibi emuleetera kubonerezebwa.

17.verse: Oyo assaayo omwoyo eri okubuulirirwa aba mu kkubo ery’obulamu, naye oyo atassaayo mwoyo ku kunenyezebwa aleetera abalala okuwaba.

18.verse: Oyo akisa obukyayi alina emimwa egirimba, era omuntu akonjera, musirusiru.

19.verse: Mu bigambo ebingi temubula kwonoona, naye akuuma olulimi lwe aba wa magezi.

20.verse: Olulimi lw’omutuukirivu ffeeza ya muwendo, naye omutima gw’omukozi w’ebibi gugasa katono.

21.verse: Ebigambo by’omutuukirivu biriisa abantu bangi, naye abasirusiru bazikirira olw’okubulwa amagezi.

22.verse: Omukisa gwa MUKAMA guleeta obugagga era tagwongerako buyinike.

23.verse: Okuwangaala Okuli mu Kutya MUKAMA - Omusirusiru asanyukira okukola ebibi, naye omuntu alina okutegeera asanyukira eby’amagezi.

24.verse: Omukozi w’ebibi ky’atayagala kirimutuukako, naye abatuukirivu bye baagala biribaweebwa.

25.verse: Embuyaga bw’ejja, abakozi b’ebibi batwalibwa, naye abatuukirivu banywera emirembe gyonna.

26.verse: Ng’omususa bwe gunyeenyeza amannyo, n’omukka nga bwe gubalagala mu maaso, n’omugayaavu bw’abeera bw’atyo eri abamutuma.

27.verse: Okutya MUKAMA kuwangaaza omuntu, naye emyaka gy’ababi girisalibwako.

28.verse: Essuubi ly’abatuukirivu livaamu ssanyu, naye okusuubira kw’abakozi b’ebibi tekulivaamu kantu.

29.verse: Ekkubo lya MUKAMA kye kiddukiro ky’abatuukirivu, naye abakozi b’ebibi libasaanyaawo.

30.verse: Abatuukirivu tebajjululwenga ennaku zonna, naye abakozi b’ebibi tebalisigala mu nsi.

31.verse: Akamwa k’omutuukirivu koogera eby’amagezi, naye olulimi olwogera eby’obubambavu lulisalibwamu.

32.verse: Emimwa gy’omutuukirivu gyogera ebisaanidde; naye emimwa gy’omukozi w’ebibi gyogera eby’obubambavu.

1.verse: Minzaani eteri ya mazima ya muzizo eri MUKAMA, naye ebipimo ebituufu bye bimusanyusa.

2.verse: Amalala bwe gajja, ng’obuswavu butuuse, naye obwetoowaze buleeta amagezi.

3.verse: Obwesimbu bw’abatuukirivu bubaluŋŋamya, naye enkwe z’abatali beesigwa zibazikirizisa.

4.verse: Obugagga tebugasa ku lunaku olw’okusalirwako omusango, naye obutuukirivu buwonya okufa.

5.verse: Obutuukirivu bw’abalongoofu bubatambuliza mu kkubo eggolokofu naye abakozi b’ebibi bagwa olw’ebikolwa byabwe ebibi.

6.verse: Obutuukirivu bw’abagolokofu bubawonya, naye abatali beesigwa bagwa mu mutego olw’okwegomba ebibi.

7.verse: Omukozi w’ebibi bw’afa, essuubi lye libula, ne byonna bye yasuubira mu maanyi bikoma.

8.verse: Omutuukirivu aggyibwa mu mitawaana, naye jjijjira omukozi w’ebibi.

9.verse: Akamwa k’oyo atatya Katonda, kazikiriza muliraanwa, naye olw’okumanya, abatuukirivu bawona.

10.verse: Abatuukirivu bwe bakulaakulana ekibuga kijaguza; abakozi b’ebibi bwe bazikirira wawulirwawo amaloboozi ag’essanyu.

11.verse: Omukisa gw’abatuukirivu gukulaakulanya ekibuga: naye olw’akamwa k’abakozi b’ebibi, ekibuga kizikirizibwa.

12.verse: Abeesigwa n’Abatambuza Eŋŋambo - Omuntu atalina magezi anyooma muliraanwa we, naye omuntu ategeera akuuma olulimi lwe.

13.verse: Aseetula olugambo atta obwesigwa, naye omuntu omwesigwa akuuma ekyama.

14.verse: Awatali kuluŋŋamizibwa eggwanga lidobonkana, naye abawi b’amagezi abangi baleeta obuwanguzi.

15.verse: Eyeeyimirira omuntu gw’atamanyiko alibonaabona, naye oyo akyawa okweyimirira aliba bulungi.

16.verse: Omukazi ow’ekisa aweebwa ekitiibwa, naye abasajja ab’amawaggali bakoma ku bugagga bwokka.

17.verse: Omusajja alina ekisa aganyulwa, naye alina ettima yeereetako akabi.

18.verse: Omukozi w’ebibi afuna empeera ey’obukuusa, naye oyo asiga eby’obutuukirivu akungula empeera eya nnama ddala.

19.verse: Omuntu omutuukirivu ddala alifuna obulamu, naye oyo akola ebitali bya butuukirivu alifa.

20.verse: MUKAMA akyawa abantu abalina emitima emikyamu, naye ab’amakubo amagolokofu be bamusanyusa.

21.verse: Mutegeerere ddala ng’abakozi b’ebibi tebalirema kubonerezebwa, naye bazzukulu b’abatuukirivu tebalibaako musango.

22.verse: Ng’empeta ya zaabu mu nnyindo y’embizzi, bw’atyo bw’abeera omukazi omulungi atalaba njawulo wakati w’ekirungi n’ekibi.

23.verse: Abatuukirivu bye beegomba bivaamu birungi byereere, naye abakozi b’ebibi bye bakola bisunguwaza.

24.verse: Omuntu Omugabi - Omuntu agaba obuteerekereza, yeeyongera bweyongezi kugaggawala; naye akwatirira kye yandigabye, yeeyongera kwavuwala.

25.verse: Omuntu agaba anagaggawalanga, n’oyo ayamba talibulako amuyamba.

26.verse: Abantu bakolimira oyo akweka eŋŋaano mu kiseera eky’obwetaavu, naye oyo agitunda mu kiseera ekyo afuna emikisa.

27.verse: Oyo anyiikira okukola obulungi afuna okuganja, naye oyo anoonya ekibi, kimujjira.

28.verse: Oyo eyeesiga obugagga bwe aligwa, naye abatuukirivu banaakulaakulananga ne baba ng’amalagala amalamu.

29.verse: Omuntu aleeta emitawaana mu maka g’ewaabwe, alisikira mpewo; era n’omusirusiru aliba muddu w’oyo alina omutima ogw’amagezi.

30.verse: Ekibala ky’omutuukirivu muti gwa bulamu, era n’oyo asikiriza emyoyo gy’abantu ne balokoka wa magezi.

31.verse: Obanga omutuukirivu alifuna ekimusaanidde ku nsi kuno, oyo atatya Katonda n’omwonoonyi balirema obutafuna ekibasaanidde?

1.verse: Buli asanyukira okukangavvulwa ayagala amagezi; naye oyo akyawa okunenyezebwa musirusiru.

2.verse: Omuntu omulungi aganja mu maaso ga MUKAMA, naye MUKAMA asalira omusango omuntu ow’enkwe.

3.verse: Omuntu tanywezebwa lwa kukola bitali bya butuukirivu, naye omulandira gw’omutuukirivu tegulisigulwa.

4.verse: Omukyala ow’empisa ennungi ssanyu era ngule ya mwami we, naye omukazi eyeeyisa obubi ali nga kookolo mu magumba ga bba.

5.verse: Enteekateeka z’omutuukirivu ziba za mazima, naye amagezi g’abakozi b’ebibi ge bawa gaba ga bulimba.

6.verse: Ebiteeso by’abakozi b’ebibi kuyiwa musaayi, naye ebigambo by’abatuukirivu bye bibawonya.

7.verse: Abakozi b’ebibi bagwa ne basaanirawo ddala, naye ennyumba y’omutuukirivu teesagaasaganenga emirembe gyonna.

8.verse: Ebigambo by’omugezi bimuleetera okusiimibwa, naye eby’omusirusiru bimunyoomesa.

9.verse: Omuntu eyeetoowaza ne yeekolera, asinga oyo eyeegulumiza n’abulwa ky’alya.

10.verse: Omutuukirivu afaayo ku bisolo bye, naye omukozi w’ebibi abiraga bukambwe bwereere.

11.verse: Oyo eyeerimira aliba n’emmere nnyingi, naye oyo anoonya ebitaliimu talina magezi.

12.verse: Abakozi b’ebibi baagala okubba omunyago gwa babbi bannaabwe, naye omulandira gw’abatuukirivu gunywera.

13.verse: Ebigambo by’omukozi w’ebibi bimusuula mu mitawaana, naye omutuukirivu awona akabi.

14.verse: Omuntu ajjuzibwa ebirungi okuva mu bibala bye bigambo by’akamwa ke, n’emirimu gy’emikono gye gimusasula bulungi.

15.verse: Ekkubo ly’omusirusiru ddungi mu kulaba kwe ye, naye omugezi assaayo omwoyo ku magezi agamuweebwa.

16.verse: Omusirusiru alaga mangu obusungu bwe, naye omutegeevu tassa mwoyo ku kivume.

17.verse: Omujulizi ow’amazima awa obujulizi obutuufu, naye omujulizi ow’obulimba ayogera bya bulimba.

18.verse: Ebigambo ebyanguyirize bisala ng’ekitala ekyogi, naye olulimi lw’omuntu omugezi luwonya.

19.verse: Emimwa egyogera amazima gibeerera emirembe gyonna, naye olulimi olulimba lwa kiseera buseera.

20.verse: Obulimba buli mu mitima gyabo abategeka okukola ebibi, naye essanyu liri n’abo abakolerera emirembe.

21.verse: Tewali kabi konna kagwa ku batuukirivu, naye abakozi b’ebibi tebaggwaako mitawaana.

22.verse: MUKAMA akyawa emimwa egirimba, naye asanyukira ab’amazima.

23.verse: Omuntu omutegeevu talaga nnyo by’amanyi, naye abasirusiru balaga obutamanya bwabwe.

24.verse: Omukono gw’omunyiikivu gulimufuula omufuzi, naye obugayaavu bufuula omuntu omuddu.

25.verse: Omutima ogweraliikirira guleetera omuntu okwennyika, naye ekigambo eky’ekisa kimusanyusa.

26.verse: Omutuukirivu yeegendereza mu mikwano gye, naye ekkubo ly’ababi libabuza.

27.verse: Omuntu omugayaavu tayokya muyiggo gwe, naye omunyiikivu kyayizze, kiba kya muwendo gyali.

28.verse: Mu kkubo ery’obutuukirivu mulimu obulamu, era mu kkubo eryo temuli kufa.

1.verse: Ensibuko y’Obugagga Obungi - Omwana omugezi assaayo omwoyo eri ebiragiro bya kitaawe, naye omunyoomi tafaayo ku kunenyezebwa.

2.verse: Omuntu asanyuka olw’ebirungi ebiva mu bibala bya kamwa ke, naye atali mwesigwa yeegomba kuleeta ntalo.

3.verse: Oyo eyeegendereza by’ayogera akuuma obulamu bwe, naye oyo amala googera, alizikirira.

4.verse: Omuntu omugayaavu yeegomba kyokka n’atabaako ky’afuna, naye omunyiikivu byayagala byonna abifuna.

5.verse: Omuntu omutuukirivu akyawa obulimba, naye omukozi w’ebibi yeereetera kunyoomebwa.

6.verse: Obutuukirivu bukuuma omuntu omwesimbu, naye okukola ebibi kuzikiriza omwonoonyi.

7.verse: Omuntu omu ayinza okwefuula omugagga ate nga taliiko ky’alina, ate omulala ne yeefuula okuba omwavu so nga mugagga nnyo.

8.verse: Obugagga bw’omuntu buyinza okumununula, naye omwavu talina ky’atya.

9.verse: Ekitangaala ky’abatuukirivu kyaka nnyo, naye ettaala y’abakozi b’ebibi ezikira.

10.verse: Amalala gazaala buzaazi nnyombo, naye amagezi gasangibwa mu abo abakkiriza okulabulwa.

11.verse: Ensimbi enkumpanye ziggwaawo, naye ezijja empolampola zeeyongera obungi.

12.verse: Essuubi erirwawo okutuukirira lirwaza omutima, naye ekyegombebwa bwe kituukirira kiba muti gwa bulamu.

13.verse: Omuntu anyooma ebiragiro aligwa mu mitawaana, naye oyo awuliriza ebimulagirwa aliweebwa empeera.

14.verse: Okuyigiriza kw’omuntu alina amagezi nsulo ya bulamu, era kuggya omuntu mu mitego gy’okufa.

15.verse: Okutegeera okulungi kuleeta okuganja, naye ekkubo ly’abateesigibwa liba zzibu.

16.verse: Omuntu omwegendereza akola amaze kulowooza, naye omusirusiru alaga obutamanya bwe.

17.verse: Omubaka omubi yeesuula mu mitawaana, naye omubaka omwesigwa aleeta kuwonyezebwa.

18.verse: Anyooma okukangavvulwa yeereetako obwavu n’obuswavu, naye oyo assaayo omwoyo ku kunenyezebwa aweebwa ekitiibwa.

19.verse: Ekyegombebwa bwe kituukirira kisanyusa omutima, naye okulekayo okukola ebibi kya muzizo eri abasirusiru.

20.verse: Oyo atambula n’abantu abagezi ageziwala, naye oyo atambula n’abasirusiru alaba ennaku.

21.verse: Emitawaana gigoberera aboonoonyi, naye okukulaakulana y’empeera y’abatuukirivu.

22.verse: Omuntu omulungi alekera bazzukulu be ebyobusika, naye obugagga bw’omwonoonyi buterekerwa omutuukirivu.

23.verse: Ennimiro z’abaavu ziyinza okuvaamu emmere nnyingi, naye obutali bwenkanya ne bugyera yonna.

24.verse: Atakozesa kaggo akyawa omwana we, naye oyo amwagala afaayo okumukangavvula.

25.verse: Omutuukirivu alya emmere ye n’akkuta, naye abakozi b’ebibi basigala nga bayala.

1.verse: Omukazi ow’amagezi yeezimbira ennyumba ye, naye omusirusiru eyiye agyemenyera n’emikono gye.

2.verse: Omuntu atambulira mu bugolokofu atya MUKAMA, naye ow’amakubo amakyamu anyooma MUKAMA.

3.verse: Ebigambo by’omusirusiru bye bimuviirako okukubwa, naye eby’abatuukirivu binaabakuumanga.

4.verse: Awataba nte nnume ezirima ebyagi biba bikalu, naye emmere ennyingi eva mu maanyi gaazo.

5.verse: Omujulizi ow’amazima talimba, naye ow’obulimba ayogera bya bulimba.

6.verse: Omukudaazi anoonya amagezi n’atagalaba, naye okumanya kwanguyira omuntu ategeera.

7.verse: Teweeretereza muntu musirusiru, kubanga tewali by’amagezi biva mu kamwa ke.

8.verse: Omutegeevu mugezi kubanga afaayo okutegeera by’akola, naye atalina magezi musirusiru kubanga yeerimba nti amanyi.

9.verse: Abasirusiru banyooma okugololwa nga bakoze ensobi, naye abalongoofu baagala emirembe.

10.verse: Buli mutima gumanya okulumwa kwagwo, tewali ayinza kugusanyukirako.

11.verse: Ennyumba y’abakozi b’ebibi erizikirizibwa, naye eweema y’abatuukirivu erikulaakulana.

12.verse: Waliwo ekkubo erirabika nga ttuufu eri omuntu, naye ng’enkomerero yaalyo kufa.

13.verse: Enseko zandibaawo naye ng’omutima gujjudde ennaku, era n’enkomerero y’essanyu eyinza okufuuka obuyinike.

14.verse: Omuntu atalina kukkiriza alisasulwa empeera emusaanira olw’ebikolwa bye, n’omuntu omulungi naye alisasulwa eyiye.

15.verse: Ow’amagezi amatono amala gakkiriza buli kigambo ky’awulira, naye omuntu omutegeevu yeegendereza amakubo ge.

16.verse: Omuntu ow’amagezi atya MUKAMA n’aleka okukola ebibi, naye omusirusiru yeepankapanka era teyeegendereza.

17.verse: Omuntu asunguwala amangu akola eby’obusirusiru, n’omukalabakalaba akyayibwa.

18.verse: Abatalina magezi basikira butaliimu, naye abategeevu batikkirwa engule ey’okumanya.

19.verse: Abakozi b’ebibi balivuunamira abatuukirivu, n’aboonoonyi ne bavuunama mu miryango gy’abatuukirivu.

20.verse: Omugagga n’Omwavu - Omwavu alagajjalirwa abantu nga ne muliraanwa we omutwaliddemu, naye abagagga baba n’emikwano mingi.

21.verse: Anyooma muliraanwa we akola kibi, naye alina omukisa oyo asaasira abaavu.

22.verse: Abateekateeka okukola ebibi, tebawaba? Naye okwagala n’amazima binaabeeranga n’abo abateesa okukola obulungi.

23.verse: Buli mulimu ogukolebwa n’amaanyi gubaako amagoba, naye okwogera obwogezi kireeta bwavu bwokka.

24.verse: Abagezi bafuna engule ey’obugagga, naye obusirusiru bw’abatalina magezi buzaala busirusiru.

25.verse: Omujulizi ow’amazima awonya obulamu bw’abantu, naye omujulizi ow’obulimba aba mulimba.

26.verse: Atya MUKAMA alina ekiddukiro eky’amaanyi, era n’abaana be balibeera n’obuddukiro.

27.verse: Okutya MUKAMA ye nsulo y’obulamu, kuleetera omuntu okwewala emitego gy’okufa.

28.verse: Ekitiibwa kya kabaka kiri mu kuba n’abantu bangi, naye omukulembeze ataba n’abantu abeera mu kabi.

29.verse: Omuntu omugumiikiriza aba n’okutegeera kungi, naye oyo asunguwala amangu ayolesa obusirusiru.

30.verse: Omutima ogulina emirembe guwangaaza omuntu, naye obuggya buvunza amagumba ge.

31.verse: Omuntu atulugunya abaavu anyooma oyo eyabatonda, naye buli abakwatirwa ekisa, agulumiza Katonda.

32.verse: Akacwano bwe kajja, omukozi w’ebibi agwa, naye omutuukirivu ne mu kufa aba n’obuddukiro.

33.verse: Amagezi gabeera mu mutima gw’omuntu alina okutegeera, era yeeyoleka ne mu basirusiru.

34.verse: Obutuukirivu buzimba eggwanga, naye ekibi kiswaza abantu ab’engeri zonna.

35.verse: Kabaka asanyukira omuddu akola eby’amagezi, naye obusungu bwa kabaka bunaabuubuukiranga ku oyo akola ebiswaza.

1.verse: Okuddamu n’eggonjebwa kumalawo ekiruyi, naye ekigambo eky’obukambwe kisaanuula obusungu.

2.verse: Olulimi lw’omugezi lwogera by’amagezi, naye akamwa k’abasirusiru kafukumula busirusiru bwereere.

3.verse: Amaaso ga MUKAMA galaba buli wantu, alaba abatuukirivu n’abakozi b’ebibi.

4.verse: Olulimi oluzimba muti gwa bulamu, naye olulimi olulimba lubetenta omutima.

5.verse: Omusirusiru anyooma okubuulirirwa kwa kitaawe, naye omutegeevu assaayo omwoyo eri okunenyezebwa.

6.verse: Mu nnyumba y’omutuukirivu mubaamu obugagga bungi, naye omukozi w’ebibi by’afuna, bimuleetera emitawaana.

7.verse: Akamwa k’amagezi kabunyisa okumanya, naye omutima gw’abasirusiru si bwe gukola.

8.verse: Ssaddaaka y’aboonoonyi ya muzizo eri MUKAMA, naye okusaba kw’abalongoofu lye ssanyu lye.

9.verse: Ekkubo ly’omwonoonyi lya muzizo eri MUKAMA, naye MUKAMA ayagala oyo anoonya obutuukirivu.

10.verse: Oyo aleka ekkubo ettuufu alikangavvulwa n’amaanyi, n’oyo akyawa okunenyezebwa alifa.

11.verse: Okufa n’okuzikirira biri mu maaso ga MUKAMA, n’okulaba alaba nnyo emitima gy’abaana b’abantu!

12.verse: Omunyoomi tayagala kunenyezebwa, era teeyeebuuza ku b’amagezi.

13.verse: Omutima omusanyufu guleeta essanyu ku maaso, naye omutima omunyiikaavu gunafuya emmeeme.

14.verse: Omutima omutegeevu gunoonya okumanya, naye akamwa k’abasirusiru kalya busirusiru.

15.verse: Omuntu bw’aba omunyiikaavu, buli kimu kimwononekera, naye omutima omusanyufu gujaguza buli kaseera.

16.verse: Okuba n’akatono ng’otya MUKAMA, kusinga okuba n’ebingi naye ng’oli mu mitawaana.

17.verse: Okulya emmere ng’eriko enva endiirwa awali okwagalana, kisinga okuliirako ebyassava awali obukyayi.

18.verse: Omuntu asunguwala amangu asaanuula oluyombo, naye omugumiikiriza akakkanya embeera.

19.verse: Ekkubo ly’omugayaavu lijjula amaggwa, naye ekkubo ly’omutuukirivu golokofu.

20.verse: Omwana omugezi asanyusa kitaawe, naye omuntu omusirusiru anyooma nnyina.

21.verse: Obusirusiru ssanyu eri oyo atalina magezi, naye omuntu ategeera atambulira mu kkubo eggolokofu.

22.verse: Awatali kuluŋŋamizibwa entegeka zifa, naye awali abawi b’amagezi abangi ziyitamu.

23.verse: Okuddamu obulungi kisanyusa, era kirungi ekigambo ekirungi okujjira mu kiseera ekituufu.

24.verse: Ekkubo ery’obulamu liyimusa omugezi, ne limuziyiza okukka emagombe.

25.verse: MUKAMA azikiriza ennyumba y’ab’amalala, kyokka akuuma ensalo za nnamwandu.

26.verse: Enkwe za muzizo eri MUKAMA, naye ebigambo ebisaanidde, bimusanyusa.

27.verse: Oyo anoonya okugaggawalira mu bukyamu aleetera ennyumba ye emitawaana, naye oyo akyawa enguzi aliba mulamu.

28.verse: Omutima gw’omutuukirivu gufumiitiriza bye gunaayanukula, naye akamwa k’omwonoonyi kafubutula ebitasaana.

29.verse: MUKAMA ali wala n’aboonoonyi, naye awulira okusaba kw’abatuukirivu.

30.verse: Amaaso agajjudde essanyu gasanyusa omutima, n’amawulire amalungi galeetera amagumba obulamu.

31.verse: Oyo assaayo omwoyo eri okunenyezebwa okuleeta obulamu, alituula wamu n’abagezi.

32.verse: Agayaalirira okubuulirirwa yeerumya yekka, naye oyo assaayo omwoyo eri okunenyezebwa afuna okutegeera.

33.verse: Okutya MUKAMA kuyigiriza omuntu amagezi, n’obwetoowaze kye kitiibwa ky’omuntu oyo.

1.verse: MUKAMA Agera Ekkubo ly’Omuntu - Omuntu ateekateeka by’ayagala okukola mu mutima gwe, Naye okuddamu kuva eri MUKAMA.

2.verse: Amakubo g’omuntu gonna gaba matuufu mu maaso ge ye, naye MUKAMA y’apima ebigendererwa.

3.verse: Emirimu gyo gyonna gikwasenga MUKAMA, naye anaatuukirizanga entegeka zo.

4.verse: MUKAMA buli kimu akikola ng’alina ekigendererwa, n’abakozi b’ebibi y’abakolera olunaku lwe batuukibwako ebizibu.

5.verse: Buli muntu alina omutima ogw’amalala wa muzizo eri MUKAMA; weewaawo talirema kubonerezebwa.

6.verse: Olw’okwagala n’olw’obwesigwa, ekibi kisasulibwa, n’okutya MUKAMA kuleetera omuntu okwewala okukola ebibi.

7.verse: Amakubo g’omuntu bwe gaba gasanyusa MUKAMA, aleetera abalabe b’omuntu oyo okubeera naye mu mirembe.

8.verse: Akatono akafune mu butuukirivu, kasinga obugagga obungi obufune mu bukyamu.

9.verse: Omutima gw’omuntu guteekateeka ekkubo lye, naye MUKAMA y’aluŋŋamya bw’anaatambula.

10.verse: Kabaka ky’ayogera kiba ng’ekiva eri Katonda, n’akamwa ke tekasaanye kwogera bitali bya bwenkanya.

11.verse: Ebipimo ne minzaani ebituufu bya MUKAMA, ebipimo byonna ebikozesebwa y’abikola.

12.verse: Kya muzizo bakabaka okukola ebibi, kubanga entebe ye ey’obwakabaka enywezebwa butuukirivu.

13.verse: Akamwa akogera eby’amazima bakabaka ke basanyukira, era baagala oyo ayogera amazima.

14.verse: Obusungu bwa kabaka buli ng’ababaka abaleese okufa, omusajja ow’amagezi alibukkakkanya.

15.verse: Kabaka bw’asanyuka kireeta obulamu; n’okuganza kwe, kuli nga ekire eky’enkuba mu biseera ebya ttoggo.

16.verse: Okufuna amagezi nga kusinga nnyo okufuna zaabu, era n’okufuna okutegeera kikira ffeeza!

17.verse: Ekkubo ly’abagolokofu kwe kwewala ebibi, n’oyo eyeekuuma mu kutambula kwe, awonya emmeeme ye.

18.verse: Amalala gakulembera okuzikirira, n’omwoyo ogwegulumiza gukulembera ekigwo.

19.verse: Okubeera n’omwoyo ogwetoowaza era n’okubeera n’abaavu, kisinga okugabana omunyago n’ab’amalala.

20.verse: Oyo assaayo omwoyo ku kuyigirizibwa alikulaakulana, era alina omukisa oyo eyeesiga MUKAMA.

21.verse: Abalina emitima egy’amagezi baliyitibwa bategeevu, n’enjogera ennungi eyongera okuyamba okutegeera.

22.verse: Amagezi nsulo ya bulamu eri oyo agalina, naye obusirusiru buleetera abasirusiru okubonerezebwa.

23.verse: Omutima gw’omuntu ow’amagezi gumuwa enjogera ennungi, era akamwa ke kayigiriza abalala.

24.verse: Ebigambo ebirungi biri ng’ebisenge by’omubisi gw’enjuki, biwoomera emmeeme, ne biwonya n’amagumba.

25.verse: Wabaawo ekkubo erirabika ng’ettuufu eri omuntu, naye ku nkomerero limutuusa mu kufa.

26.verse: Okwagala okulya kuleetera omuntu okukola n’amaanyi, kubanga enjala emukubiriza okweyongera okukola.

27.verse: Omuntu omusirusiru ategeka okukola ebitali bya butuukirivu, era n’ebigambo bye, biri ng’omuliro ogwokya ennyo.

28.verse: Omuntu omubambaavu asiikuula entalo, n’ow’olugambo ayawukanya ab’omukwano enfirabulago.

29.verse: Omuntu omukyamu asendasenda muliraanwa we n’amutwala mu kkubo eritali ttuufu.

30.verse: Omuntu atemya ku liiso ateekateeka kwonoona, n’oyo asongoza emimwa ategeka kukola bitali birungi.

31.verse: Omutwe ogw’envi ngule ya kitiibwa, gufunibwa abo abatambulira mu bulamu obutuukirivu.

32.verse: Omuntu omugumiikiriza asinga omutabaazi, n’oyo afuga obusungu bwe akira awamba ekibuga.

33.verse: Akalulu kayinza okukubibwa, naye okusalawo kwa byonna kuva eri MUKAMA.

1.verse: Okulya akamere akaluma awali emirembe, kisinga okuba mu nnyumba ejjudde ebyassava nga mulimu entalo.

2.verse: Omuddu omugezi alifuga omwana wa bowo akwasa ensonyi, era alifuna ebyobusika ng’omu ku baana b’awaka.

3.verse: Entamu erongoosa yakolebwa lwa ffeeza, n’ekikoomi ky’okulongoosa lwa zaabu, naye MUKAMA agezesa emitima.

4.verse: Omubi assaayo omwoyo eri eby’obulimba, era n’omulimba awuliriza olulimi olukuusa.

5.verse: Oyo akudaalira omwavu avvoola eyamutonda, n’oyo asanyukira obuyinike bw’abalala talirema kubonerezebwa.

6.verse: Abazzukulu ngule ya bajjajjaabwe, era n’abaana beenyumiririza mu bakadde baabwe.

7.verse: Enjogerannungi teba ya musirusiru, ng’oweekitiibwa bw’atasaana kwogera bya bulimba.

8.verse: Enguzi eri ng’ejjinja ery’omufuusa mu maaso g’oyo agigaba, alowooza nti buli gy’akyukira eneemuyamba.

9.verse: Okwagala tekulondoola nsobi, naye oyo atasonyiwa nsobi akyawaganya ab’omukwano enfirabulago.

10.verse: Okunenya kuyamba nnyo omuntu ategeera, okusinga okukuba omusirusiru embooko ekikumi.

11.verse: Omukozi w’ebibi anoonya bujeemu bwereere, era kyaliva asindikirwa omubaka omukambwe.

12.verse: Okusisinkana eddubu enyagiddwako abaana baayo, kisinga okusisinkana omusirusiru mu busirusiru bwe.

13.verse: Ebbeeyi y’Amagezi - Omuntu bw’asasula ekibi olw’obulungi, ekibi tekiriva mu nnyumba ye.

14.verse: Okutandika oluyombo kuli ng’omuntu bw’asumulula omudumu gw’amazzi, noolwekyo vvaawo ng’oluyombo terunnatandika.

15.verse: Eyejjeereza omukozi w’ebibi n’oyo avumirira omutuukirivu, bombi ba muzizo eri MUKAMA.

16.verse: Omusirusiru agasibwa ki okuba ne ssente ezisasulibwa amagezi, ng’ate ye talina mutima gwegomba magezi?

17.verse: Omukwano ogw’amagezi guba gwa lubeerera, era owooluganda yeesigibwa mu biro eby’ennaku.

18.verse: Omuntu atalina magezi awa obweyamo ne yeetema okusasula amabanja ga muliraanwa we.

19.verse: Oyo ayagala ekibi anyumirwa ennyombo, n’oyo akola omulyango omunene ogw’omu maaso gwa bbugwe ye nga guyitiridde obunene gulimuteganya nnyo.

20.verse: Omuntu ow’omutima omubambaavu takulaakulana, n’oyo ow’olulimi olulimba agwa mu katyabaga.

21.verse: Omwana omusirusiru aleetera kitaawe obuyinike, kitaawe w’omusirusiru taba na ssanyu.

22.verse: Omutima ogw’essanyu ddagala ddungi, naye omwoyo omunyiikaavu gukozza omubiri.

23.verse: Omuntu omubi alya enguzi mu kyama, alyoke aziyize amazima okweyoleka.

24.verse: Omuntu omutegeevu, ebirowoozo abissa eri amagezi, naye amaaso g’omusirusiru gasamaalirira ensi gy’ekoma.

25.verse: Omwana omusirusiru buyinike eri kitaawe, era aleeta ennaku eri nnyina eyamuzaala.

26.verse: Si kirungi okuweesa omutuukirivu engassi ey’obwereere wadde okukuba ab’ekitiibwa embooko olw’obwesimbu bwabwe.

27.verse: Omuntu omwegendereza mu bigambo bye abeera n’okutegeera, n’oyo alina omwoyo omuteefu aba muntu wa magezi.

28.verse: Omusirusiru bw’asirika alowoozebwa okuba n’amugezi, era aba mutegeevu bw’afuga akamwa ke.

1.verse: Ebigambo by’Abagezi n’Abasirusiru - Eyeggya ku banne aba yeerowoozako yekka, era tawuliriza magezi gamuweebwa.

2.verse: Omusirusiru tasanyukira kutegeera, ky’asanyukira kyokka kwe kwogera by’alowooza.

3.verse: Okukola ekibi bwe kujja n’okunyooma kujjirako, era awali okuyisaamu omuntu amaaso wabaawo okunyoomoola.

4.verse: Ebigambo by’omu kamwa k’omuntu mazzi ga buziba, naye ensulo ey’amagezi mugga ogukulukuta.

5.verse: Si kirungi kuttira mubi ku liiso, oba okusaliriza omutuukirivu.

6.verse: Akamwa k’omusirusiru kamuleetera entalo era akamwa ke kamuleetera okukubwa emiggo.

7.verse: Akamwa k’omusirusiru ke kamuleetera okuzikirira, era n’emimwa gye mutego eri emmeeme ye.

8.verse: Ebigambo by’omuntu ageya biri ng’emmere ewoomerera, bigenda mu bitundu by’omubiri eby’ewala.

9.verse: Omuntu omugayaavu mu mirimu gy’akola, waluganda n’oyo azikiriza.

10.verse: Erinnya lya MUKAMA kigo ky’amaanyi, omutuukirivu addukira omwo n’afuna emirembe.

11.verse: Obugagga bw’omugagga, kye kibuga kye ekiriko bbugwe ow’amaanyi, era mu kulaba kwe, kigo kye ekigumu ekitarinnyika.

12.verse: Omuntu nga tannagwa, omutima gwe gwegulumiza, naye okwetoowaza kumuweesa ekitiibwa.

13.verse: Oyo addamu amangu mu nsonga gy’ateetegerezza, buba busirusiru bwe era buswavu.

14.verse: Omwoyo gw’omuntu gumuwanirira mu bulwadde, naye emmeeme eyennyise ani ayinza okugigumiikiriza?

15.verse: Omutima gw’omwegendereza guyiga okumanya, amatu g’omuntu omugezi gawuliriza.

16.verse: Ekirabo ky’omuntu kimuseguliza, era kimutuusa ne mu maaso g’abeekitiibwa.

17.verse: Asooka okweyogerako y’afaanana ng’omutuufu, okutuusa omulala lw’amubuuza ebibuuzo.

18.verse: Okukuba akalulu kimalawo empaka, era kisalawo eggoye wakati w’abawakana ab’amaanyi.

19.verse: Kyangu okuwamba ekibuga ekiriko bbugwe ow’amaanyi, okusinga okukomyawo owooluganda anyiize, era ennyombo ziba ng’empagi z’ekigo.

20.verse: Omuntu anakkutanga ebigambo ebiva mu kamwa ke; ebibala ebijjula akamwa ke bye binamukkusanga.

21.verse: Olulimi lulina obuyinza okuwa obulamu oba okutta, era n’abo abalwagala balirya ebibala byalwo.

22.verse: Azuula omukazi omulungi ow’okuwasa aba azudde ekirungi, era aganja eri MUKAMA.

23.verse: Omwavu yeegayirira, naye omugagga addamu na bbogo.

24.verse: Akwana emikwano emingi yeereetera okuzikirira, naye wabaawo ow’omukwano akwagala ennyo okusinga owooluganda.

1.verse: Omuntu omwavu atambulira mu butuukirivu, asinga akamwa ak’omusirusiru akaweebuula.

2.verse: Si kirungi okuba omujjumbize naye nga tolina kumanya, n’okwanguyiriza okukola ekintu kuleetera omuntu okukwata ekkubo ekyamu.

3.verse: Obusirusiru bw’omuntu bwe bwonoona obulamu bwe, kyokka omutima gwe ne gunenya MUKAMA.

4.verse: Obugagga buleeta emikwano mingi, naye emikwano gy’omwavu gimuddukako.

5.verse: Omujulizi ow’obulimba talirema kubonerezebwa, era oyo ayogera eby’obulimba taliba na buddukiro.

6.verse: Bangi banoonya okuganja mu maaso g’omufuzi, era buli muntu aba mukwano gw’oyo agaba ebirabo.

7.verse: Baganda b’omwavu bonna bamwewala, mikwano gye tebaasingewo nnyo okumwewala? Wadde abagoberera ng’abeegayirira, naye tabalaba.

8.verse: Oyo afuna amagezi ayagala emmeeme ye, n’oyo asanyukira okutegeera, akulaakulana.

9.verse: Omujulizi ow’obulimba talirema kubonerezebwa, n’oyo ayogera eby’obulimba alizikirira.

10.verse: Omusirusiru tasaana kubeera mu bulamu bwa kwejalabya, kale kiwulikika kitya ng’omuddu afuga abalangira?

11.verse: Omuntu omutegeevu alwawo okusunguwala, era kiba kya kitiibwa obutafa ku bye bamusobezza.

12.verse: Obusungu bwa kabaka buli ng’okuwuluguma kw’empologoma, naye ekisa kye kiri ng’omusulo ku ssubi.

13.verse: Omwana omusirusiru aleetera kitaawe okuzikirira, n’omukazi omuyombi ali ng’enkuba etonnya olutata.

14.verse: Ennyumba n’obugagga bisikirwa okuva ku bazadde, naye omukazi omutegeevu ava eri MUKAMA.

15.verse: Obugayaavu buleeta otulo tungi, n’omuntu atakola mirimu alirumwa enjala.

16.verse: Oyo akwata ebiragiro akuuma obulamu bwe, naye oyo eyeeyisa mu ngeri embi alifa.

17.verse: Oyo akwatirwa omwavu ekisa awola MUKAMA, era MUKAMA alimusasula olw’ekikolwa kye ekyo.

18.verse: Kangavvulanga omwana wo kubanga mu ekyo mulimu essuubi, oleme kumuwaayo mu kuzikirira.

19.verse: Omuntu omukambwe ennyo alisasula ebiriva mu bukambwe bwe, kubanga ne bw’omununula ogusooka era oteekwa okukiddiŋŋaana.

20.verse: Ssangayo omwoyo ku magezi agakuweebwa ne ku kuyigirizibwa, oluvannyuma lwa byonna oliba n’amagezi.

21.verse: Enteekateeka z’omuntu ziba nnyingi mu mutima gwe; byo ebigendererwa bya MUKAMA bituukirira.

22.verse: Ekintu omuntu kye yeegomba kwe kwagala okutaggwaawo, okuba omwavu kisinga okuba omulimba.

23.verse: Okutya MUKAMA kutuusa mu bulamu; olwo omuntu n’awummula nga mumativu nga tatuukiddwako kabi.

24.verse: Omugayaavu annyika omukono gwe mu kibya, n’atagukomyawo nate ku mumwa gwe.

25.verse: Kangavvula omunyoomi, abatamanyi bayigire ku ye, buulirira ategeera, ajja kweyongera okutegeera.

26.verse: Omwana abba ebya kitaawe n’agobaganya ne nnyina, aleeta obuswavu n’obuyinike.

27.verse: Mwana wange konoolekayo okuyigirizibwa, onoowaba okuva ku bigambo by’okumanya.

28.verse: Omujulizi omulimba atyoboola ensala ey’amazima, n’akamwa k’ababi, kavaabira ebitali bya butuukirivu.

29.verse: Ebibonerezo bitekebwawo kukangavvula banyoomi, n’embooko zaakolebwa lwa migongo gy’abasirusiru.

1.verse: Omwenge mukudaazi, ekitamiiza muleekaanyi, era buli alaga mu kkubo ekyamu olw’ebyo talina magezi.

2.verse: Obusungu bwa kabaka buli ng’okuwuluguma kw’empologoma, n’oyo amusunguwaza yeefiiriza bulamu bwe.

3.verse: Kya kitiibwa omuntu okwewala entalo, naye buli musirusiru ayagala okuyomba.

4.verse: Omugayaavu talima mu budde butuufu, kyanaavanga anoonya eby’amakungula nga talina kantu.

5.verse: Ebigendererwa ebiba mu mutima gw’omuntu biba ng’amazzi ag’ebuziba, naye omuntu alina okutegeera alibiggyayo.

6.verse: Abantu bangi bagamba nti balina okwagala okutaggwaawo, naye ani ayinza okuzuula omuntu omwesigwa?

7.verse: Omuntu omutuukirivu, atambulira mu bulamu obutaliiko kyakunenyezebwa; ba mukisa abaana be abalimuddira mu bigere.

8.verse: Kabaka bw’atuula ku ntebe ye ey’obwakabaka ng’asala emisango, amaaso ge gasunsulamu ne gaggyamu ebibi byonna.

9.verse: Ani ayinza okugamba nti, “Ntukuzza omutima gwange, ndi mulongoofu era sirina kibi?”

10.verse: Ebipima obuzito ebitatuuka n’ebigera ebikyamu, byombi bya muzizo eri MUKAMA.

11.verse: Omuvubuka naye amanyibwa olw’ebikolwa bye, obanga birongoofu era nga birungi.

12.verse: Okutu okuwulira n’eriiso eriraba byombi MUKAMA ye y’abikola.

13.verse: Toyagalanga kwebaka oleme kwavuwala, tunula, obeerenga n’ebyokulya bingi.

14.verse: “Si kirungi, si kirungi,” bw’ayogera agula; naye bw’agenda n’alyoka yeenyumiririza mu ky’aguze.

15.verse: Zaabu n’amayinja ag’omuwendo weebiri, naye emimwa egyogera eby’amagezi kye ky’omuwendo ekisingako.

16.verse: Omuntu bw’aleeta ekyambalo kye ne yeeyimiririra gw’atamanyi, kitwalire ddala, na ddala bw’abanga yeeyimiririra omukazi omubambaavu.

17.verse: Emmere enfune mu bukyamu ewooma mu kulya, naye emufuukira amayinja mu kamwa.

18.verse: Kola entegeka nga weebuuza ku magezi, bw’oba onoolangirira olutalo sooka weebuuze.

19.verse: Oyo agenda ng’asaasaanya olugambo abotola ebyama, noolwekyo weewale omuntu ayogerayogera ennyo ebitaliimu.

20.verse: Omuntu akolimira kitaawe oba nnyina, ettabaaza ye erizikizibwa n’asigala mu kizikiza ekikutte ennyo.

21.verse: Eby’obusika ebifune ng’ekiseera kyabyo tekinnatuuka, ku nkomerero tebiba na mukisa.

22.verse: Toyogera nti, “Nzija kukusasula olw’ekibi kino!” Lindirira MUKAMA alikuyamba.

23.verse: Ebipima ebikyamu bya muzizo eri MUKAMA, ne minzaani ez’obulimba tezisanyusa.

24.verse: Amakubo g’omuntu gategekebwa MUKAMA, omuntu ayinza atya okutegeera ekkubo lya MUKAMA?

25.verse: Kyambika eri omuntu okwanguyiriza okweyama eri MUKAMA, naye oluvannyuma n’afumiitiriza ku bye yeeyamye.

26.verse: Kabaka omugezi asengejja n’aggyamu abakozi b’ebibi, n’ababonereza awatali kusaasira.

27.verse: Ettabaaza ya MUKAMA ekebera omwoyo gw’omuntu, n’enoonya mu bitundu eby’omunda ennyo.

28.verse: Okwagala n’obwesigwa bikuuma kabaka mu butebenkevu, era obufuzi bwe bunywezebwa na kwagala.

29.verse: Amaanyi kye kitiibwa ky’abavubuka, envi kye kitiibwa ky’abakadde.

30.verse: Emiggo n’ebiwundu biggyawo ebibi, n’embooko zitereeza ebifo eby’omunda ennyo.

1.verse: Omutima gwa kabaka guli ng’amazzi agakulukutira mu mukono gwa MUKAMA, era agukyusiza gy’ayagala yonna.

2.verse: Buli kkubo lya muntu liba ng’ettuufu mu maaso ge, naye MUKAMA apima omutima.

3.verse: Okukola ebituufu n’eby’amazima kisanyusa MUKAMA okusinga ssaddaaka.

4.verse: Amaaso ageegulumiza, n’omutima ogw’amalala, ye ttabaaza y’ababi, era ebyo kwonoona.

5.verse: Enteekateeka z’omunyiikivu zivaamu magoba meereere, naye okwanguyiriza okutalina nteekateeka kuvaamu bwavu.

6.verse: Okufuna obugagga n’olulimi olulimba, mpewo buwewo etwalibwa eruuyi n’eruuyi era mutego gwa kufa.

7.verse: Obukambwe bw’ababi bulibamalawo, kubanga bagaana okukola eby’ensonga.

8.verse: Ekkubo ly’abazza emisango liba kyamu, naye ery’abataliiko musango liba golokofu.

9.verse: Okusula ku kasolya k’ennyumba, kisinga okubeera mu nnyumba n’omukazi omuyombi.

10.verse: Emmeeme y’omubi yeegomba okukola ebibi; talaga muliraanwa we kisa n’akatono.

11.verse: Omukudaazi bw’abonerezebwa, atalina magezi agafuna; n’ow’amagezi bw’ayigirizibwa afuna okutegeera.

12.verse: Katonda alaba ebifa mu nnyumba y’omubi, era abakozi b’ebibi abazikkiririza ddala.

13.verse: Oyo aziba amatu ge eri okulaajana kw’omwavu, naye alikoowoola nga talina amwanukula.

14.verse: Ekirabo ekigabire mu kyama kikakkanya obusungu obungi, n’enguzi ebikiddwa mu munagiro eggyawo ekiruyi ekingi.

15.verse: Ensonga bwe zisalibwa mu bwenkanya, lye ssanyu eri abatuukirivu, naye kiba kyekango eri abakozi b’ebibi.

16.verse: Omuntu awaba okuva mu kkubo ly’okutegeera, agukira mu bafu.

17.verse: Aganza eby’amasanyu anaabanga mwavu, n’oyo ayagala omwenge n’amafuta taligaggawala.

18.verse: Abakozi b’ebibi batuukibwako emitawaana egyandigudde ku balungi, n’ekyandituuse ku b’amazima kituuka ku batali beesigwa.

19.verse: Okubeera mu ddungu, kisinga okubeera n’omukazi omuyombi anyiiganyiiga.

20.verse: Mu nnyumba y’omutuukirivu mubaamu eby’obugagga eby’omuwendo, naye omusirusiru ebibye byonna abyonoona.

21.verse: Agoberera obutuukirivu n’ekisa, alibeera n’obulamu obukulaakulana n’ekitiibwa.

22.verse: Omuntu ow’amagezi alumba ekibuga eky’abazira nnamige, era n’asesebbula enfo yaabwe gye beesiga.

23.verse: Afuga akamwa ke n’olulimi lwe, yeewoonya emitawaana.

24.verse: “Mukudaazi,” lye linnya ly’ab’amalala abeeraga, abeetwalira mu kwemanya okw’ekitalo mwe batambulira.

25.verse: Okwetaaga kw’omugayaavu lwe luliba olumbe lwe, kubanga emikono gye tegyagala kukola.

26.verse: Olunaku lwonna aba yeegomba kweyongezaako, naye omutuukirivu agaba awatali kwebalira.

27.verse: Ssaddaaka y’omubi ya muzizo, na ddala bw’agireeta ng’alina ekigendererwa ekitali kirungi.

28.verse: Omujulizi ow’obulimba alizikirira, naye ekigambo ky’oyo ayogera eby’amazima kiribeerera emirembe gyonna.

29.verse: Omuntu omubi yeekazaakaza, naye omuntu ow’amazima yeegendereza amakubo ge.

30.verse: Tewali magezi, newaakubadde okutegeera, wadde ebiteeso ebiyinza okulemesa MUKAMA.

31.verse: Embalaasi etegekerwa olunaku olw’olutalo, naye obuwanguzi buva eri MUKAMA.

1.verse: Omugaso gw’Erinnya Eddungi - Erinnya eddungi lyagalibwa okusinga eby’obugagga ebingi, n’okuganja kusinga ffeeza oba zaabu.

2.verse: Abagagga n’abaavu balina kimu ekibagatta, MUKAMA ye Mutonzi waabwe bonna.

3.verse: Omuntu omutegeevu bw’alaba akabi yeekweka, naye abatalina magezi bagenda bugenzi mu maaso ne balumizibwa.

4.verse: Obugagga n’ekitiibwa n’obulamu y’empeera ey’okwetoowazanga n’okutyanga MUKAMA.

5.verse: Amaggwa n’emitego biri mu kkubo ly’omubambaavu; naye oyo akuuma emmeeme ye anaabyewalanga.

6.verse: Manyiiriza omwana mu kkubo erimugwanira okutambulirangamu, ne bw’alikula talirivaamu.

7.verse: Omugagga afuga abaavu, naye eyeewola aba muddu w’oyo amuwola.

8.verse: Asiga obutali butuukirivu akungula mitawaana, n’oluga olw’obusungu bwe lulizikirizibwa.

9.verse: Omuntu omugabi anaabanga n’omukisa, kubanga emmere ye agirya n’abaavu.

10.verse: Goba omunyoomi, entalo zinaagenda, ennyombo n’okuvumagana binaakoma.

11.verse: Omuntu eyeegomba omutima omulongoofu era ayogera n’eggonjebwa, talirema kuganja ewa kabaka.

12.verse: Amaaso ga MUKAMA galabirira amazima, era adibya entegeka z’abatali beesigwa.

13.verse: Omugayaavu ayogera nti, “Ebweru eriyo empologoma,” oba nti, “Nnyinza okutemulirwa mu kkubo.”

14.verse: Malaaya mutego gwa kabi, akolimiddwa MUKAMA mw’afiira.

15.verse: Obusirusiru busibiddwa ku mutima gw’omwana omuto, naye omuggo ogukangavvula gulimuwonyeza ddala.

16.verse: Omuntu atulugunya abaavu ne yeeyongera okugaggawala, n’oyo agabira omugagga awa abagagga enguzi, enkomerero ya bombi bwavu.

17.verse: Ossangayo omwoyo okuwuliriza ebigambo by’omugezi, n’omutima gwo eri ebyo bye njigiriza.

18.verse: Kibeera kya ssanyu bw’obikwata ku mutima gwo, n’oba mwetegefu okubiddamu byonna.

19.verse: Mbikumanyisa leero ggwe, obwesige bwo bubeerenga mu MUKAMA.

20.verse: Kale sikuwandiikidde ebintu amakumi asatu ebikuwabula era ebikuwa okumanya?

21.verse: Sikulaze ekirungi n’ekituufu, olyoke obe n’eky’okuddamu eri oyo eyakutuma?

22.verse: Tonyaganga mwavu, kubanga mwavu, oba okutulugunyanga aleeteddwa mu mbuga.

23.verse: Kubanga MUKAMA alibawolereza, n’abo ababanyaga alibanyaga.

24.verse: Tokwananga muntu wa busungu, oba okuyitanga n’omuntu anyiiganyiiga amangu,

25.verse: oleme okuyiga amakubo ge ne weesuula mu mitawaana.

26.verse: Teweegattanga ku abo abeeyama, newaakubadde ku abo abeeyimirira ab’amabanja.

27.verse: Bw’oliba nga tolina kya kusasula ekitanda kyo kyennyini kye kirikuggyibwako.

28.verse: Tojjululanga nsalo bajjajjaabo gye bassaawo edda.

29.verse: Omanyi omuntu omunyiikivu era omukugu mu mulimu gwe? Aliweereza bakabaka; taliweereza bantu batamanyiddwa.

1.verse: Bw’otuulanga okulya n’omufuzi, weetegerezanga ebiri mu maaso go;

2.verse: era weegendereze bw’obanga omanyi ng’olulunkanira ebyokulya.

3.verse: Tolulunkanira mmere ye ennungi, kubanga erimbalimba.

4.verse: Teweemalangako mirembe ng’oyaayaanira obugagga; weefuge obeere mukkakkamu.

5.verse: Eby’obugagga obikubako eriiso limu nga by’agenze dda, kubanga ddala bimera ebiwaawaatiro ne bibuuka mu bbanga ng’empungu.

6.verse: Tolyanga mmere ya muntu mukodo, wadde okwegomba ebirungi by’alya.

7.verse: Kubanga ye muntu abalirira ensimbi z’asaasaanyizza, n’akugamba nti, “Weeriire, weenywere,” naye ng’omutima gwe tegukusanyukira.

8.verse: Akatono k’onooba olidde onookasesema, ebigambo byo ebirungi eby’okwebaza bibe bya bwereere.

9.verse: Totegana kubuulirira musirusiru, kubanga ajja kunyooma ebigambo byo eby’amagezi.

10.verse: Tojjululanga nsalo ey’edda, so toyingiriranga nnimiro za bamulekwa,

11.verse: kubanga abalwanirira w’amaanyi, alikuggulako omusango.

12.verse: Ossangayo omwoyo eri okuyigirizibwa, n’amatu go eri ebigambo by’okutegeera.

13.verse: Tolekangayo kukangavvula mwana, bw’omubonereza n’akaggo tekimutta.

14.verse: Mubonerezenga n’akaggo, kiwonye emmeeme ye okufa.

15.verse: Mwana wange, bw’oba n’omutima ogw’amagezi, kinsanyusa.

16.verse: Nnaajjaguzanga okuva ku ntobo y’omutima gwange, bw’onooyogeranga ebituufu.

17.verse: Omutima gwo gulemenga okukwatirwa aboonoonyi obuggya, kyokka nyiikira okutya MUKAMA ebbanga lyonna.

18.verse: Mazima ddala onoobanga n’essuubi mu biseera eby’omu maaso, n’essuubi lyo eryo teririggwaawo.

19.verse: Mwana wange wulirizanga, obeerenga n’amagezi, okumenga omutima gwo mu kkubo ettuufu.

20.verse: Teweegattanga ku abo abeekamirira omwenge, n’abalulunkanira ennyama:

21.verse: Kubanga omutamiivu n’omuluvu baavuwala, n’okubongoota olutata kubambaza enziina.

22.verse: Wulirizanga kitaawo eyakuzaala, so togayanga nnyoko ng’akaddiye.

23.verse: Gula amazima so togatunda, ffuna amagezi, n’okuyigirizibwa n’okutegeera.

24.verse: Kitaawe w’omutuukirivu alina essanyu lingi, n’oyo azaala omwana ow’amagezi amwenyumiririzaamu.

25.verse: Leka kitaawo ne nnyoko basanyuke, omukazi eyakuzaala ajaguzenga.

26.verse: Mwana wange mpa omutima gwo, n’amaaso go geekalirize amakubo gange,

27.verse: kubanga omukazi omwenzi lukonko luwanvu, n’omukazi omubambaavu luzzi lufunda.

28.verse: Ateega ng’omutemu, n’ayongera ku muwendo gw’abasajja abatali beesigwa eri bakazi baabwe.

29.verse: Ani alina obuyinike? Ani alina ennaku? Ani alina ennyombo? Ani alina okwemulugunya? Ani alina ebiwundu eby’obwereere? Ani amyuse amaaso?

30.verse: Abo abatava ku mwenge, nga bagenda baloza ku mwenge omutabule.

31.verse: Totunuulira wayini ng’amyuse, bw’atemaganira mu ggiraasi ng’akka empolampola;

32.verse: ku nkomerero aluma ng’omusota, wa busagwa ng’essalambwa.

33.verse: Amaaso go galiraba ebyewuunyo, n’omutwe gwo ne gulowooza ebitategeerekeka.

34.verse: Oliba ng’omuntu eyeebase wakati mu nnyanja, obanga oyo alengejjera waggulu ku mulongooti.

35.verse: Olyogera nti, “Bankubye, naye sirumiddwa. Bankubye naye sirina kye mpuliddemu. Nnaazuukuka ddi, neeyongere okunywa?”

1.verse: Teweegombanga bakozi ba bibi era tobeesemberezanga.

2.verse: Kubanga emitima gyabwe giteesa kukola bya butemu, era akamwa kaabwe koogera ku kukola bya ffujjo.

3.verse: Amagezi ge gazimba ennyumba, n’okutegeera kwe kugiggumiza.

4.verse: Olw’amagezi ebisenge by’ayo bijjula ebintu ebirungi, eby’obugagga ebitalabikalabika eby’omuwendo omungi.

5.verse: Omuntu ow’amagezi aba n’obuyinza, n’omuntu alina okumanya yeeyongera amaanyi.

6.verse: Kubanga okulwana olutalo weetaaga okuluŋŋamizibwa, n’okuluwangula, weetaaga abawi b’amagezi bangi.

7.verse: Amagezi gasukkirira nnyo omusirusiru, talina ky’asobola kwogera mu lukuŋŋaana olw’oku wankaaki.

8.verse: Oyo asala enkwe ez’okukola ebibi, aliyitibwa mukujjukujju.

9.verse: Entegeka ez’obusirusiru muvaamu kwonoona, abantu beetamwa omukudaazi.

10.verse: Bw’oyongobera mu kiseera eky’ebizibu, olwo ng’olina amaanyi matono!

11.verse: Odduukiriranga n’owonya abo abatwalibwa okuttibwa, n’abo abali ku njegoyego z’okuttibwa, obawonye okuttirwa obwemage.

12.verse: Bw’ogambanga nti, “Laba kino twali tetukimanyi,” oyo akebera emitima aba talaba? Oyo akuuma obulamu bwo takimanyi? Talisasula buli muntu ng’omulimu gwe bwe guli?

13.verse: Mwana wange olyanga omubisi gw’enjuki kubanga mulungi, omubisi oguva mu bisenge byagwo guwoomerera.

14.verse: Era manya nti amagezi gawoomera emmeeme yo, bw’onoogafuna onoobeera n’essuubi mu bulamu obw’omu maaso, n’essuubi lyo teririkoma.

15.verse: Toteeganga, ng’omunyazi bw’akola ku nnyumba y’omutuukirivu, tonyaganga maka ge.

16.verse: Omuntu omutuukirivu ne bw’agwa emirundi omusanvu, addamu n’ayimuka, naye abakozi b’ebibi basuulibwa mu mitawaana.

17.verse: Tosanyukanga ng’omulabe wo agudde, bwe yeesittalanga omutima gwo gulemenga okujaguza.

18.verse: Si kulwa nga MUKAMA akiraba ne kitamusanyusa, n’amusunguwalira.

19.verse: Teweeraliikiriranga olw’abo abakola ebibi, so abakozi b’ebibi tobakwatirwanga buggya.

20.verse: Kubanga omuntu omubi talina ssuubi mu maaso, ettabaaza y’abakozi b’ebibi erizikizibwa.

21.verse: Mwana wange otyanga MUKAMA, ne kabaka, era teweetabanga na bajeemu.

22.verse: Kubanga obusungu bwabwe bulibuubuukira ku bajeemu era ani amaanyi akabi akalibatuukako?

23.verse: Ebigambo Eby’amagezi - Bino nabyo era bigambo by’abalina amagezi. Okwekubiira ng’osala emisango si kirungi.

24.verse: Kale oyo agamba azizza omusango nti, “Toliiko ky’ovunaanibwa,” abantu banaamukolimiranga, n’amawanga ganaamwetamwanga.

25.verse: Naye abo abasalira omusobya omusango ne gumusinga banaabanga n’essanyu, n’omukisa omulungi gulibatuukako.

26.verse: Eky’okuddamu eky’amazima, kiri ng’okunywegerwa.

27.verse: Malirizanga omulimu gwo ogw’ebweru, oteeketeeke ennimiro zo, n’oluvannyuma olyoke weezimbire ennyumba yo.

28.verse: Towanga bujulizi bwa bulimba ku muliraanwa wo, so akamwa ko tekalimbanga.

29.verse: Toyogeranga nti, “Omuntu oyo ndimukola nga bw’ankoze, era ndimusasuza nga bw’ampisizza.”

30.verse: Nayita ku nnimiro ey’omugayaavu, ne mpita ne ku nnimiro y’emizabbibu ey’oyo atalina kutegeera.

31.verse: Kale laba, ng’ennimiro eyo ebunye amaggwa, wansi wonna nga wabikkiddwa omuddo, n’olukomera lwayo olw’amayinja nga lugudde.

32.verse: Ne neekaliriza ne ntegeera ne nfuna ekyokuyiga mu bye nalaba.

33.verse: Otulo otutonotono, n’okusumagira akatono, n’okufunya emikono okuwummulako,

34.verse: obwavu bulikutuukako ng’omutemu, era n’obwetaavu ng’omutemu.

1.verse: Engero Endala Eza Sulemaani - Zino nazo ngero za Sulemaani abasajja ba Keezeekiya kabaka wa Yuda ze baakoppolola.

2.verse: Okukisa ensonga kitiibwa kya Katonda, naye okunoonyereza ensonga kitiibwa kya bakabaka.

3.verse: Ng’eggulu bwe lyewanise waggulu ennyo n’ensi bw’ekka ennyo wansi, bwe gityo n’emitima gya bakabaka bwe gitategeerekeka.

4.verse: Effeeza giggyeemu ebisejja, olyoke ofune omuweesi ky’anaakozesa.

5.verse: Ggyawo abakozi b’ebibi mu maaso ga kabaka, entebe ye ey’obwakabaka eryoke enywezebwe mu butuukirivu.

6.verse: Teweekuzanga mu maaso ga kabaka, wadde okwewa ekifo mu bantu ab’ekitiibwa.

7.verse: Kubanga okukugamba nti, “Jjangu wano mu maaso,” kisingako okukuswaza mu maaso g’ow’ekitiibwa.

8.verse: Amaaso go bye galabye tobyanguyirizanga kubireeta mu mbuga, kubanga oluvannyuma onookola otya munno bw’anaakuswaza?

9.verse: Bw’owozanga ne muliraanwa wo, tobikkulanga kyama kya muntu mulala,

10.verse: akiwulira aleme okukuswaza; n’onyoomebwa ebbanga lyonna.

11.verse: Ekigambo ekyogere nga bwe kisaanidde, kiba kya muwendo nnyo nga zaabu gwe batonye mu bintu bye bakoze mu ffeeza.

12.verse: Ng’empeta ey’omu kutu eya zaabu, oba akakomo aka zaabu ennungi, bw’atyo omuntu ow’amagezi anenya, bw’abeera eri okutu okuwuliriza.

13.verse: Ng’obunnyogovu bw’omuzira bwe bubeera mu biseera eby’okukunguliramu, bw’atyo bw’abeera omubaka omwesigwa eri abo abamutuma, aweweeza emmeeme ya bakama be.

14.verse: Ng’ebire n’empewo omutali nkuba, omuntu asuubiza ebirabo by’atagaba bw’abeera.

15.verse: Muliraanwa n’Omulabe - Okugumiikiriza okungi kuyinza okukkirizisa omufuzi, n’olulimi olw’eggonjebwa lumenya eggumba.

16.verse: Bw’ozuula omubisi gw’enjuki, lyako ogwo gwokka ogukumala, si kulwa ng’ogukkuta nnyo n’ogusesema.

17.verse: Tokyalanga lunye ewa muliraanwa wo, si kulwa ng’akwetamwa n’akukyawa.

18.verse: Omuntu awa obujulizi obw’obulimba ku muliraanwa we, ali ng’embuukuuli, oba ekitala, oba akasaale akoogi.

19.verse: Okwesiga omuntu ateesigika, kiri ng’oli alina erinnyo eddwadde oba ekigere ekirema.

20.verse: Ng’omuntu eyeeyambula engoye mu kiseera eky’obutiti, era ng’omwenge omukaatuufu bwe guteekebwako oluvu, bw’atyo bw’abeera ayimbira oyo ali mu buyinike.

21.verse: Omulabe wo bw’aba alumwa enjala, muwe emmere alye, bw’aba alumwa ennyonta muwe amazzi anywe.

22.verse: Kubanga oliba otuuma amanda g’omuliro ku mutwe gwe, era MUKAMA alikuwa empeera.

23.verse: Ng’empewo ey’obukiikakkono bwereeta enkuba, n’olulimi oluyomba bwe luleetera omuntu obusungu.

24.verse: Okusulanga mu kasonda waggulu ku nnyumba, kisinga okubeera n’omukazi omuyombi mu nnyumba.

25.verse: Ng’amazzi amannyogovu bwe gaba eri emmeeme erumwa ennyonta, bwe gatyo bwe gaba amawulire amalungi agava mu nsi ey’ewala.

26.verse: Ng’oluzzi olusiikuuse, oba ensulo eyonoonese, bw’atyo bw’abeera omutuukirivu eyeewaayo eri omukozi w’ebibi.

27.verse: Si kirungi kulya mubisi gwa njuki mungi, bwe kityo si kirungi omuntu okwenoonyeza ekitiibwa.

28.verse: Omuntu ateefuga ali ng’ekibuga ekimenyeemenye ne kirekebwa nga tekirina bbugwe.

1.verse: Omusirusiru n’Obusirusiru bwe - Ng’omuzira bwe gutasaana mu biseera bya kusiga oba enkuba mu makungula, n’ekitiibwa bwe kitasaanira musirusiru.

2.verse: Ng’enkazaluggya ewabye, ng’akataayi akabuukabuuka, ekikolimo ekitasaanidde tekibaako kye kikola.

3.verse: Embooko ya mbalaasi, n’olukoba lwa ndogoyi, n’omuggo gusaanira migongo gya basirusirusiru.

4.verse: Toyanukulanga musirusiru ng’obusirusiru bwe, bwe buli, oleme kubeera nga ye.

5.verse: Omusirusiru omuddangamu ng’obusirusiru bwe, bwe buli, si kulwa nga yeerowooza nti mugezi.

6.verse: Omuntu atuma omusirusiru, aba ng’eyeetemyeko ebigere n’anywa obusungu.

7.verse: Ng’amagulu g’omulema bwe galengejja obulengezzi, bwe lutyo n’olugero bwe lubeera mu kamwa k’omusirusiru.

8.verse: Ng’atadde ejjinja mu nvuumuulo bw’aba, n’oyo awa omusirusiru ekitiibwa bw’atyo bw’abeera.

9.verse: Ng’eriggwa bwe lifumita mu mukono gw’omutamiivu, bwe lutyo n’olugero bwe lubeera mu kamwa k’abasirusiru.

10.verse: Ng’omulasi w’akasaale, amala galasa buli gw’asanze, bw’abeera bw’atyo apangisa omusirusiru oba omuyise yenna gw’asanze.

11.verse: Ng’embwa bw’eddira ebisesemye by’ayo, bw’atyo bw’abeera omusirusiru adda mu nsobi ze.

12.verse: Olaba omuntu omugezi mu maaso ge ye? Omusirusiru alina essuubi okumusinga.

13.verse: Omugayaavu agamba nti, “Mu kkubo eriyo empologoma, empologoma enkambwe eyita mu luguudo!”

14.verse: Ng’oluggi bwe lukyukira ku ppata zaalwo, bw’atyo omugayaavu bw’akyukira ku kitanda kye.

15.verse: Omugayaavu akoza n’engalo ze mu kibya, naye olw’obunafu bwe n’atasobola kuzizza mu kamwa.

16.verse: Omugayaavu alowooza nti mugezi, okusinga abantu omusanvu abaddamu ebibuuzo mu butuufu.

17.verse: Ng’asika embwa amatu, omuyise bw’abeera eyeeyingiza mu luyombo olutali lulwe.

18.verse: Ng’omulalu akasuka emmuli ez’omuliro oba obusaale obutta,

19.verse: bw’abeera omuntu alimba munne, n’agamba nti, “Mbadde nsaaga busaazi.”

20.verse: Enku bwe zibula omuliro guzikira, awatali lugambo ennyombo ziggwaawo.

21.verse: Ng’amanda ku gannaago agaliko omuliro, oba enku ku muliro, bw’abeera omusajja omuyombi mu kuwakula entalo.

22.verse: Ebigambo by’omuntu ageya biri ng’emmere ewoomerera, bigenda mu bitundu by’omubiri eby’ewala.

23.verse: Ng’ekintu eky’ebbumba ekibikkiddwako amasengere, bwe gibeera emimwa eminyiikivu egisibuka ku mutima omubi.

24.verse: Omuntu ow’enkwe alimbalimba n’emimwa gye naye ng’aterese obulimba mu mutima gwe.

25.verse: Wadde nga by’ayogera bisanyusa, tomukkiririzaamu kubanga eby’emizizo musanvu bijjuza mu mutima gwe.

26.verse: Enkwe ze ziyinza okubikkibwa mu kubuzaabuuza, naye obutali butuukirivu bwe buliggyibwayo mu lukuŋŋaana.

27.verse: Buli asima ekinnya y’alikigwamu, n’oyo aliyiringisa ejjinja gwe liriddira.

28.verse: Olulimi olulimba lukyawa abo be lufumita, n’akamwa akawaanawaana kaleeta okuzikirira.

1.verse: Amagezi aga Leero n’Ebiseera eby’omu mu Maaso - Teweenyumirizanga mu bya nkya, kubanga olunaku bye lunaaleeta tobimanyi.

2.verse: Leka omulala akutenderezenga so si kamwa ko ggwe, omuntu omulala so si mimwa gyo.

3.verse: Ejjinja lizitowa, n’omusenyu muzito, naye obulumbaganyi bw’omusirusiru businga byonna okuzitowa.

4.verse: Obusungu bwa ttima, n’ekiruyi kifugira ddala nnyo, naye ani ayinza okwolekera amaaso g’obuggya?

5.verse: Okunenya mu lwatu, kisinga okwagala okukisibbwa.

6.verse: Okunywegera kw’omulabe kwandiba okungi, naye ebiwundu by’okunenya kw’owoomukwano tebitiisa.

7.verse: Oyo akkuse akyawa omubisi gw’enjuki, naye eri omuyala n’ekikaawa kiba kiwoomerera.

8.verse: Ng’akanyonyi akadduka mu kisu kyako, bw’atyo bw’abeera omuntu abula mu maka ge.

9.verse: Ebyakaloosa bisanyusa omutima, n’obuwoomerevu bw’omukwano gw’omuntu bwe butyo bwe buvaamu okubuulirira okw’amazima.

10.verse: Mukwano gwo ne mukwano gwa kitaawo tobaabuuliranga, olemenga okutawaana okuswala ewa muganda wo ng’ogudde mu mitawaana. Muliraanwa wo akira muganda wo akuli ewala.

11.verse: Beeranga n’amagezi mwana wange, osanyusenga omutima gwange, ndyoke nyanukule oyo yenna ansekerera.

12.verse: Omuntu omutegeevu alaba akabenje ne yeekweka, naye abatalina magezi batambula butambuzi ne bagwa mu kabi.

13.verse: Twalanga ekyambalo ky’oyo eyeeyimirira gw’atamanyi, era kwatanga eky’oyo eyeeyimirira omukazi omwenzi kye yeeyamye.

14.verse: Okulamusa ku muliraanwa wo mu makya ennyo, ng’oleekaana, obanga amukolimidde.

15.verse: Omukazi omuyombi ali ng’enkuba etonnya olutata, ku lunaku olw’enkuba ennyingi.

16.verse: Okumuziyiza obanga aziyiza empewo oba ng’anyweza omuzigo mu ngalo.

17.verse: Ng’ekyuma bwe kiwagala ekyuma, n’omuntu bw’abangula muntu munne.

18.verse: Buli alabirira omutiini alirya ku bibala byagwo, n’oyo aweereza mukama we alissibwamu ekitiibwa.

19.verse: Ng’amazzi bwe galaga omuntu bw’afaanana mu maaso, bwe gutyo omutima gw’omuntu bwe gulaga omuntu bw’afaanana.

20.verse: Amagombe ne ggeyeena tebikkuta, n’amaaso g’abantu nago bwe gatyo tegakkuta.

21.verse: Entamu erongoosa ya ffeeza n’ekikoomi kikola ku zaabu, naye omuntu ekimugezesa kutenderezebwa.

22.verse: Ne bw’osekula omusirusiru mu kinu, nga bw’osekula emmere y’empeke mu kinu, obusirusiru bwe tobumuggyaamu.

23.verse: Okakasanga nti omanyi bulungi embeera z’ekisibo kyo, ossangayo omwoyo ku ggana lyo.

24.verse: Kubanga eby’obugagga tebibeerera mirembe gyonna, n’engule tebeerera mirembe gyonna.

25.verse: Ng’omuddo gw’ensolo omukulu gumaze okusalibwawo, ng’omutoototo gutandise okusibukawo, nga n’omuddo ogw’omu busozi guleeteddwa,

26.verse: abaana b’endiga balikuwa engoye ez’okwambala, n’embuzi ziritundibwa ne zivaamu ensimbi.

27.verse: Olibeera n’amata mangi g’onoggyanga mu mbuzi, okukuliisa ggwe n’ab’omu nnyumba yo, n’okuliisa abaweereza bo abawala.

1.verse: Abakozi b’ebibi badduka nga tewali abagoba, naye abatuukirivu babeera n’obuvumu ng’empologoma.

2.verse: Eggwanga bwe lijeema, liba n’abafuzi bangi, naye olw’omuntu alina okutegeera n’okumanya obutebenkevu budda nate mu nsi.

3.verse: Omufuzi anyigiriza abaavu, afaanana nga enkuba etonnya ezikiriza n’eterekaawo birime.

4.verse: Abo abava ku mateeka ga MUKAMA batendereza aboonoonyi, naye abo abagakuuma babawakanya.

5.verse: Abantu abakozi b’ebibi tebategeera bwenkanya, naye abo abanoonya MUKAMA babutegeerera ddala bulungi.

6.verse: Omuntu omwavu atambulira mu butuukirivu, asinga omugagga ow’amakubo amakyamu.

7.verse: Oyo akuuma amateeka ga MUKAMA mwana eyeegendereza, naye mukwano gw’ab’omululu akwasa kitaawe ensonyi.
