8.verse: Ayongera ku bugagga bwe mu bukumpanya, abukuŋŋaanyiza omulala anaayinza okuba ow’ekisa eri abaavu.

9.verse: Atassaayo mwoyo kuwulira mateeka ga MUKAMA, n’okusaba kwe tekukkirizibwa.

10.verse: Buli akyamya abatuukirivu mu kkubo ebbi, aligwa mu katego ke ye, naye abatuukirivu balisikira ebirungi.

11.verse: Omugagga alowooza nti mugezi, naye omwavu alina okutegeera, amunyooma.

12.verse: Abatuukirivu bwe bawangula wabaawo okujaguza okw’amaanyi, naye abakakanyalira mu kukola ebikyamu bwe bafuna obuyinza abantu beekweka.

13.verse: Oyo akweka ebibi bye, talifuna mukisa kukulaakulana, naye buli abyatula n’abireka, alisaasirwa.

14.verse: Alina omukisa omuntu atya MUKAMA ebbanga lyonna, naye oyo akakanyaza omutima gwe abonaabona.

15.verse: Ng’empologoma ewuluguma oba eddubu eritiisatiisa, bw’abeera omufuzi omubi atulugunya abateesobola.

16.verse: Omufuzi nantagambwako tafuga na bwenkanya, naye oyo akyawa amagoba agafuniddwa mu bukyamu alibeera n’essanyu ery’obulamu obuwangaazi.

17.verse: Omuntu alumirizibwa olw’okutta munne, alibeera mu kutegana okutuusa okufa, tewabanga n’omu amuyamba.

18.verse: Omuntu atambulira mu bugolokofu alinunulibwa talibeerako kabi, naye oyo ow’amakubo amabi aligwa mbagirawo.

19.verse: Omuntu alima ennimiro ye aliba n’emmere nnyingi, naye oyo ali mu birowoozo ebitaliimu alifa bwavu.

20.verse: Omusajja omwesigwa aliweebwa emikisa mingi, naye oyo ayanguyiriza okugaggawala talirema kubonerezebwa.

21.verse: Okuttira abantu ku liiso ng’osala emisango si kirungi, naye ate olw’okunoonya akookulya omuntu ayinza okuzza omusango.

22.verse: Omusajja omukodo yeegomba okugaggawala, naye nga tamanyi nti obwavu bumulindiridde.

23.verse: Oyo anenya omuntu, oluvannyuma aliganja, okusinga oyo awaaniriza n’olulimi.

24.verse: Buli anyaga kitaawe, oba nnyina, n’agamba nti, “Si nsonga,” afaanana n’oyo azikiriza.

25.verse: Omuntu ow’omululu aleeta oluyombo, naye oyo eyeesiga MUKAMA aligaggawazibwa.

26.verse: Eyeesiga omutima gwe, musirusiru, naye oyo atambulira mu magezi alifuna emirembe.

27.verse: Agabira abaavu talibaako ne kye yeetaaga, naye abakodowalira anaabanga n’ebikolimo bingi.

28.verse: Abakozi b’ebibi bwe babeera mu buyinza, abantu beekweka, naye abakozi b’ebibi bwe bazikirira, abatuukirivu bakulaakulana.

1.verse: Obukulembeze bw’Abatuukirivu - Omuntu akakanyaza omutima gwe oluvannyuma lw’okunenyezebwa emirundi emingi, alizikirira ng’atamanyiridde awatali kuwona.

2.verse: Abatuukirivu bwe bakulaakulana, abantu basanyuka, naye abakakanyalira mu kukola ebikyamu bwe bafuga abantu babeera mu kusinda.

3.verse: Ayagala amagezi asanyusa kitaawe, naye munne w’abamalaaya ayiwaayiwa obugagga bwe.

4.verse: Kabaka afuga n’obwenkanya, abantu be baba mu butebenkevu, naye oyo alulunkanira enguzi, ensi agyonoona.

5.verse: Omuntu awaanawaana munne, aba yeetega yekka ekitimba.

6.verse: Ebibi by’omwonoonyi bye bimutega, naye omutuukirivu abeera mu kuyimba na kusanyuka.

7.verse: Omutuukirivu afaayo ku nsonga z’abaavu, naye abakozi b’ebibi tebakola bwe batyo.

8.verse: Abakudaazi basasamaza ekibuga, naye abantu abalina amagezi baziyiza entalo.

9.verse: Omuntu ow’amagezi bw’awoza n’omusirusiru, omusirusiru ayongera kusunguwala, n’okujerega ne wataba mirembe.

10.verse: Abeegomba okuyiwa omusaayi bakyawa omuntu ow’amazima, era banoonya okusaanyaawo obulamu bwe.

11.verse: Omusirusiru alaga obusungu bwe bwonna, naye omuntu ow’amagezi abuziyiza n’abukkakkanya.

12.verse: Omufuzi bw’awuliriza eby’obulimba, abakungu be bonna bafuuka babi.

13.verse: Omwavu n’oyo amubonyaabonya balina ekibagatta: MUKAMA bombi ye yabawa amaaso.

14.verse: Kabaka bw’asalira abaavu emisango n’obwesigwa, obufuzi bwe bubeerera emirembe gyonna.

15.verse: Akaggo akakangavvula, kaleeta amagezi, naye omwana alekeddwa awo, aswaza nnyina.

16.verse: Abakozi b’ebibi bwe beeyongera obungi, okumenya amateeka kweyongera, naye abatuukirivu baliraba okugwa kwabwe.

17.verse: Kangavvula omwana wo, alikuwa emirembe, alireetera emmeeme yo essanyu.

18.verse: Awatali kwolesebwa abantu tebaba beegendereza, naye wa mukisa oyo akuuma amateeka ga MUKAMA.

19.verse: Omuweereza tayinza kubuulirirwa na bigambo byokka; ne bw’aba ategedde tafaayo.

20.verse: Olaba omuntu ayanguyiriza ebigambo bye? Omusirusiru alina essuubi okumusinga.

21.verse: Atiitiibya omuweereza we ekiyitiridde ng’akyali mwana muto, oluvannyuma omuweereza aleetera mukama we obuyinike.

22.verse: Omuntu ow’obusungu aleeta ennyombo, n’omuntu asunguwala amangu ayonoona nnyo.

23.verse: Amalala g’omuntu galimuleetera okugwa, naye omuntu ow’omwoyo ogwetoowaza alifuna ekitiibwa.

24.verse: Buli assa ekimu n’omubbi akyawa obulamu bwe ye, era ne bw’alayizibwa tasaanira kubaako ky’ayogera.

25.verse: Okutya omuntu kuleeta ekyambika, naye buli eyeesiga MUKAMA anaabanga mirembe.

26.verse: Bangi abanoonya okuganja mu maaso g’omufuzi, naye obwenkanya obwa nnama ddala buva eri MUKAMA.

27.verse: Atali mutuukirivu wa muzizo eri abatuukirivu; era omwesimbu wa muzizo eri abakozi b’ebibi.

1.verse: Ebigambo ba Aguli - Bino bye bigambo bya Aguli mutabani wa Yake; obubaka bwe yawa bwe buno: Bw’ati omusajja ono bwe yagamba Isiyeri, Isyeri ono ne Ukali.

2.verse: Ddala Ayi Katonda wange nze nsinga obutategeera, sirina kutegeera kwa bantu.

3.verse: Siyize magezi, so n’oyo Omutukuvu simumanyi.

4.verse: Ani eyali alinnye mu ggulu n’akka? Ani eyali akuŋŋaanyiza empewo mu kibatu ky’engalo ze? Ani eyali asibye amazzi mu kyambalo kye? Ani eyatonda enkomerero zonna ez’ensi? Erinnya lye y’ani, ne mutabani we y’ani? Mbulira obanga obimanyi.

5.verse: Buli kigambo kya Katonda kya mazima, era aba ngabo eri abo abamwesiga.

6.verse: Toyongeranga ku bigambo bye, alemenga okukunenya naawe olabike ng’omulimba.

7.verse: Ebintu bibiri bye nkusaba; Ayi MUKAMA, tobinnyimanga nga sinnafa:

8.verse: Ebigambo eby’obutaliimu n’eby’obulimba binteeke wala, ate era tonjavuwazanga wadde okungaggawaza, naye ndiisanga emmere eya buli lunaku.

9.verse: Nneme okukkutanga ne nkwegaana ne njogera nti, “MUKAMA ye y’ani?” Era nnemenga okuba omwavu ne nziba, ne nvumisa erinnya lya Katonda wange.

10.verse: Tosekeetereranga muweereza eri mukama we, alemenga okukukolimira, naawe omusango ne gukusinga.

11.verse: Waliwo abo abakolimira bakitaabwe ne batasabira na bannyaabwe mukisa;

12.verse: abo abeeraba ng’abatuukirivu bo mu maaso gaabwe, ate nga tebanaazibwangako bibi byabwe.

13.verse: Waliwo abo ab’amalala amayitirivu, abatunuza okwemanya okw’ekitalo,

14.verse: n’ebeerayo abo abalina amannyo agali ng’ebitala, n’emba zaabwe nga zirimu ebiso, okusaanyaawo abaavu mu nsi, n’abo abali mu kwetaaga.

15.verse: Ekinoso kirina bawala baakyo babiri abaleekaana nti, “Mpa! mpa!” Waliwo ebintu bisatu ebitakkuta, weewaawo bina ebitagamba nti, “Matidde,”

16.verse: Amagombe, olubuto olugumba, ettaka eritakutta mazzi, n’omuliro ogutayogera nti, “Ebyo binaamala!”

17.verse: Eriiso ly’oyo anyooma kitaawe, era n’atagondera nnyina, liriggibwamu bannamuŋŋoona ab’omu kiwonvu, ne liriibwa ensega.

18.verse: Waliwo ebigambo bisatu eby’ekitalo ennyo gye ndi, weewaawo bina bye sitegeera:

19.verse: Empungu engeri gye yeeyisaamu mu bbanga, n’omusota engeri gye gwewalulamu wakati mu mayinja, n’ekyombo gye kiseeyeeyamu ku nnyanja, n’engeri omusajja gye yeeyisaamu ng’ali n’embeerera.

20.verse: Bw’ati bwe yeeyisa omukazi omwenzi: alya n’asiimuula emimwa gye n’agamba nti, “Sirina kibi kye nkoze.”

21.verse: Ensi ekankanira wansi w’ebintu bisatu weewaawo bina:

22.verse: omuweereza bw’afuuka kabaka, n’omusirusiru bw’akutta emmere;

23.verse: n’omukazi eyadibira mu ddya; n’omuweereza omuwala bw’afumbirwa bba wa mugole we.

24.verse: Waliwo ebintu ebitono bina ku nsi, ebirina amagezi amangi ennyo.

25.verse: Enkolooto bye biwuka ebitalina maanyi mangi, naye byeterekera emmere yaabyo mu kyeya;

26.verse: obumyu busolo bunafu naye bwezimbira ennyumba zaabwo mu mayinja;

27.verse: enzige tezirina kabaka, kyokka zitabaala zonna mu bibiina byazo;

28.verse: omunya oyinza okugukwasa engalo, naye mu mbiri za bakabaka gusangibwamu.

29.verse: Waliwo ebintu bisatu ebyesimba obulungi mu kitiibwa nga bitambula, weewaawo bina ebitambulira mu kitiibwa:

30.verse: empologoma esinga ensolo zonna amaanyi era kabaka waazo, so tewali gy’esegulira yonna;

31.verse: sseggwanga, n’embuzi ennume, ne kabaka eyeetooloddwa eggye lye.

32.verse: Bw’oba ng’obadde okoze eby’obusirusiru ne weegulumiza, obanga obadde oteekateeka okukola ebibi, weekomeko weekwate ku mumwa.

33.verse: Kubanga okusunda amata kuzaala omuzigo, n’okunyiga ennyindo kuleeta omusaayi, okutankuula obusungu, bwe kutyo kuleeta entalo.

1.verse: Okulabula ku Kunywa Ekitamiiza - Ebigambo bya kabaka Lemweri bye yayogera, nnyina bye yamuyigiriza.

2.verse: Ggwe mutabani wange, ggwe mutabani w’enda yange, ggwe mutabani w’obweyamo bwange.

3.verse: Tomaliranga maanyi go ku bakazi, newaakubadde amaanyi go ku abo abazikiriza bakabaka.

4.verse: Ggwe Lemweri, si kya bakabaka, si kya bakabaka okunywanga omwenge, so si kya balangira okwegombanga omwenge,

5.verse: si kulwa nga bagunywa ne beerabira amateeka, ne batalamula mu bwenkanya abantu baabwe abatulugunyizibwa.

6.verse: Ekitamiiza mukiwenga oyo ayagala okufa, n’omwenge oyo alina emmeeme eriko obuyinike.

7.verse: Mumuleke anywenga yeerabire obwavu bwe, alemenga kujjukira nate buyinike bwe.

8.verse: Yogereranga abo abatasobola kweyogerera, otunulenga mu nsonga z’abo bonna abaasigala ettayo.

9.verse: Yogera olamulenga n’obwenkanya, olwanirirenga abaavu n’abali mu bwetaavu.

10.verse: Omukazi ow’Amagezi - Omukazi omwegendereza ani ayinza okumulaba? Wa muwendo nnyo okusinga amayinja ag’omuwendo ennyo.

11.verse: Bba amwesiga n’omutima gwe gwonna, era bba talina kyonna kya muwendo ky’abulwa.

12.verse: Aleetera bba essanyu so tamukola kabi, obulamu bwe bwonna.

13.verse: Anoonya ebyoya by’endiga n’anoonya ne ppamba, n’akola emirimu gye mu ssanyu eritayogerekeka.

14.verse: Ali ng’ebyombo by’abasuubuzi, aleeta emmere okuva mu nsi ezeewala.

15.verse: Agolokoka tebunnakya, n’awa ab’omu nnyumba ye ebyokulya, n’agabira abaweereza be abawala be abaweereza emirimu egy’okukola.

16.verse: Alowooza ku nnimiro n’agigula; asimba ennimiro ey’emizabbibu n’ebibala by’emikono gye.

17.verse: Omukazi oyo akola n’amaanyi omulimu gwe, emikono gye gikwata n’amaanyi emirimu gye.

18.verse: Ayiiya ebyamaguzi ebirimu amagoba n’abisuubula, era n’ettabaaza ye ekiro tezikira.

19.verse: Anyweza omuti oguluka ppamba mu mukono gwe, engalo ze ne zikwata akati akalanga.

20.verse: Ayanjululiza abaavu omukono gwe, n’agololera omukono gwe oyo ali mu bwetaavu.

21.verse: Mu biseera by’obutiti taba na kutya, kubanga ab’omu nnyumba ye bonna baba n’engoye ez’okwambala.

22.verse: Yeekolera ebibikka obuliri bwe, era engoye ze za linena omulungi, za ffulungu.

23.verse: Bba amanyibbwa, y’omu ku bakulu abakulembera ensi, era ateeseza mu nkiiko enkulu.

24.verse: Omukazi atunga ebyambalo ebya linena n’abitunda, n’aguza abasuubuzi enkoba.

25.verse: Amaanyi n’ekitiibwa bye byambalo bye, era tatya ebiro ebigenda okujja.

26.verse: Ayogera n’amagezi, era ayigiriza ebyekisa.

27.verse: Alabirira nnyo empisa z’ab’omu nnyumba ye, era talya mmere ya bugayaavu.

28.verse: Abaana be bagolokoka ne bamuyita wa mukisa, ne bba n’amutendereza ng’ayogera nti,

29.verse: “Abakazi bangi abakola eby’ekitiibwa naye bonna ggwe obasinga.”

30.verse: Obubalagavu bulimba n’endabika ennungi teriiko kyegasa, naye omukazi atya MUKAMA anaatenderezebwanga.

31.verse: Mumusasule empeera gy’akoleredde, n’emirimu gye gimuweesenga ettendo ku miryango gy’ekibuga.
